Reviews.Author: Yaoyu Yang
Reviews.Content: Pretty good. Like it for this price. The stand is ok, remote controller is ok but the TV looks really awesome. Good deal.

Reviews.Title: Very good quality picture display
Reviews.Author: Kyle Miller
Reviews.Content: The picture display on this tv is very impressive from a brand I have never heard of, it's comparable to a Samsung or LG. the sound quality could be better but with TruSuround audio output, connecting a 5.1 home theater system is very simple and sounds amazing. Overall i am very impressed and happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: O cosmo, Ocosmo, strange name but works great.
Reviews.Author: wally adesanya
Reviews.Content: This Led Hdtv is actually very nice. I ordered it and it arrived pretty quickly. The picture shows really good and clear as can be when watching hd channels. The sound quality is standard, although  I'm not expecting a bose theater sound. The motion of the 60Hz refresh rate has not been a factor, it stays up to par so far. Im just a week in to having the tv, so I'm satisfied with the purchase as of today.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV, better than I expected
Reviews.Author: Kingdomer
Reviews.Content: I picked this TV based on the price and the reviews.  Ordered on black Friday and received it Monday morning.  Kudos for the super fast shipping.The TV is excellent too.  I'm using a multimedia player so I don't want a smart TV.  This one has everything I need and no useless extras.  The finish of the TV looks upscale and not a typical generic brand.  When I fired it up the first time, I felt both the picture and the sound are too harsh, after tweaking various settings in the setup, the picture and the sound are superb, noticeably better than my other name brand TV.One small problem I have with it is that even with the volume turned all the way down to 1, it's still a bit too loud in a quiet environment such as late at night.  In other situations this is not a problem.

Reviews.Title: BUY IT!
Reviews.Author: Veneble D. Bullock
Reviews.Content: SWEET DEAL! Good sound ,great picture, perfect price! What more to say/ This was my first, and I am happy. Especially the price!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: I. M. Bachus
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV and received it only after a two days.  Super fast shipping, thanks Amazon!  I'm very impressed with this TV.  For the price, there is probably nothing better.  Has a good amount of source inputs.  I hooked it up to my external antenna to receive channels over the air and it works great.  The HD channels are crisp and clear and the SD channels look like they are supposed to.  It only took a few minutes to scan through and find the OTA channels.  The sound seems pretty good too.  I haven't had much of a chance to throw much else at it yet but my initial impression is that it was totally worth the price.  It's a steal really.  I will update my review if things go south but so far so good!  Save yourself some money and buy this TV if you are looking for a 40 inch without smart TV features.

Reviews.Title: Totally legit!
Reviews.Author: boca.llena.de.galletitas
Reviews.Content: When Amazon put these on sale for $249 I bought one as a gift for my dad. The price made me skeptical, so I unboxed it and set it up to check it out before I give it to him. I'm happy to report it seems to be a very nice television! Fantastic deal!

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Jersey Girl
Reviews.Content: Ordered it Friday at $279 and when they lowered the price the next day, I emailed them and Amazon refunded the difference.TV arrived Monday, well padded and packaged, included a cleaning cloth and miniature screw driver.Assembling the base was easy. Remote control is color-coded and controls the TV, Roku and soundbar.The screen is 40" diagonally, about 4 inches thick (8.66" thick with the base)It has a three prong plug so I can't plug it into my Optimum cable box-it just means I have to program the IO remote to shut the TV off ( funny note: the manual says to use SONY tv codes to program your remotes).Box says QAM- meaning you don't need a cable box to decode digital channels ( but I have a box anyway).I had to adjust some of the aspect settings but the picture is gorgeous. Non-HD channels are, well, the same as they areon any HD TV.  I think the sound quality is fine but there are multiple settings to adjust the sound.I haven't hooked up my vcr/dvd player yet.It has a sleep timer. It has a separate set of controls on the right side of the TV for volume, channels and menu.On the back of the TV, in the center, it has the hook-ups for headphones, etcVery happy with this purchase. It is replacing a 32" Phillips HDTV from Amazon that I moved into the bedroom to replace an old 26 inch old-style boxy TV.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV for the Perfect Price
Reviews.Author: Victoria Rose Shepard
Reviews.Content: I didn't want a smart TV or anything extra special, but I did want a 40" LED TV that could actually be in my price range and this TV was it.  Clear picture, blu-rays look great on it, and although the sound on it is alright we added a sound bar which made it perfect.  If you're not looking for a name brand TV for twice the price and just want to have a large screen with sharp picture for half the price then this is the right TV for you.

Reviews.Title: Best HDTV buy this Christmas season.
Reviews.Author: Henry E. Fairman
Reviews.Content: This set has a fantastic picture and sound. It features a simulated 3-D image on HD signals. It even recognized the Goole Pay stick. Regular and Blu-Ray DVDs look fantastic. The only problem I had was mating the U-Verse remote to turn the set on/off. The Christmas parades and football games will astound your guests on Thanksgiving. A plus was a $10 discount on the new Roku stick. I haven't checked on air reception yet since Kalamazoo has poor reception from all stations except PBS.

Reviews.Title: Not great, decent for the price.
Reviews.Author: Manuel Aguirre
Reviews.Content: Bought the tv simply because the price is so cheap. The picture is good, and so is the sound. What I didn't like was that this tv has three HDMI ports, yet only one of them works properly, which bothered me, but seeing as I only need one isn't a deal breaker for me. Still it being a full hundred dollars cheaper than other tv's the same size, I can live with it.

Reviews.Title: A Great 1080p TV for Half the Price of More Well Known Brands
Reviews.Author: K4AIC
Reviews.Content: Wow this TV is AMAZING! Granted, I have only had it one day lol, but I absolutely LOVE IT!! My 4 year old Colby was dying and took 20 minutes to just turn on, so I needed to get a new tv, and also wanted a bigger tv since I got the PS4. I wanted nothing less than 1080p, and noticed it costs about $50 to $100 more than the 720, being on a less than $300 budget, it was difficult to find something with good reviews. I saw the oSOCMO 32 inch, which has well over 4 stars on 40 reviews, so figured the brand was good, although never heard of it before. I didn't like how Amazon decided to just ship this in the TV box, good thing I was home because people would have seen a big TV sitting on the porch! Package was banged up a little, but the inside of the box the TV was secure, so it all was good.The setup was really easy, except the whole base thing took me a bit to figure out how to screw it all down right, the thing even comes with a screwdriver lol. I plugged everything in, plugged PS3 and PS4 into the HDMIs with ease....it auto scanned for channels (took about 15 minutes). Turned on with a CRYSTAL clear picture, amazing quality. Comparable to more expensive brands. Cant complain, this thing is awesome, the remote is cool, haven't played with too many of the features yet but just writing to say it is worth buying if you need something great with little hit to the wallet.

Reviews.Title: Cheap but decent
Reviews.Author: Stephen A. Means "big_slacker"
Reviews.Content: I got this as a TV for my man cave to watch while I'm riding a spin bike for long periods of time. It performs great, especially considering the price!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the low
Reviews.Author: TonyaB "IamTonyaBrown"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for like $200 during the Black Friday sale and I am super pleased with the tv. Shows great and works well

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!
Reviews.Author: Nesme0035
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV back in November when it was on sale and at the time it was under $300. In all honesty, despite the deal I got for it. It's performance is phenomenal! Some of you might beg to differ like my friend. Who seems to says there's an input delay with these type of TV/monitors, but I don't care! If there is, it's so subtle that I can't notice it. It could also be because I've never own an HD TV or anything bigger than 32 inch. All that matters is that I'm happy with it!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for $250
Reviews.Author: Michael Janosko
Reviews.Content: Okay, I bought this TV for $250 back in November. I have put it through quite a bit of use since then. I have had absolutely no problems with it. I love the picture quality, it looks fantastic. Unfortunately, it seems to have undergone a significant price jump. I believe that it is still well worth the cost. The sound is also quite powerful for TV speakers, though I rarely use the built in ones.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: A. Overton "down 95 lbs."
Reviews.Content: This TV was bought for my Husband and he has used it for 6 months now and it works wonderfully. The screen is very clear and the sound is clear. I would recommned this TV and would even buy another if one was needed.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Claudette Clark
Reviews.Content: I bought htis TV for a friend for Christmas and she loves it, great bargain. It has a really nice picture and being Roku ready is a plus

Reviews.Title: AAA
Reviews.Author: mario d "mario"
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my new tv.Its been 6 months now and I have no problems with it.Perfect picture and very good sound

Reviews.Title: Awesome picture!
Reviews.Author: Esther V.
Reviews.Content: I have to admit that I was a little hesitant due to the price.  But all I can say now is WOW!  We just upgraded our service to HD and the quality of this HDTV is amazing.  It seems at times that some of the images may just pop out at any moment.  Definitely a fantastic product for an even better price than expected.

Reviews.Title: My TV
Reviews.Author: Netha Graedel
Reviews.Content: Great bargain at the time, I no longer have to squint at my 20" 10 year old TV so happy I bought it

Reviews.Title: Bought two of them for kids to game on side by side
Reviews.Author: Tim Berger
Reviews.Content: For the price of one...this risk was well worth it.  The TVs work fine for what they are intended for, including watching movies on Netflix,  The sound is fine, which appears to have been the only, and rather meager issue voiced by reviews I read.  The connectivity of these sets is outstanding...lots of ports for everything.

Reviews.Title: Happy!
Reviews.Author: D. Ash
Reviews.Content: I have been using this tv for several months and for the price it is a great buy.  Sharp picture, easy adjustments, and lightweight. The only thing I wish it would do is play movies from a portable usb drive.

Reviews.Title: Great display, color & sound. Super value!
Reviews.Author: Johnny Nuclear
Reviews.Content: Great tv, has all the options & quality of displays twice the price! Good sound also. Easy to setup & use. Highly recommended, especially at this price.

Reviews.Title: This is a great buy
Reviews.Author: Happy
Reviews.Content: What a great TV. I needed it for a temporary apartment and now I am keeping it for my guest room. It is priced right and it delivers good image.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: J. Cooper
Reviews.Content: Good picture, inputs, and price was a bargin.  Con  is the sound. I have adjusted many times and you cannot make it sound good without a stereo or soundbar.  At the price I paid you can afford a sound bar.  I like my TCL 32 inch I purchased a year ago a little better as the sound is much better and just as good of picture. As a side note the first one I got had a broken screen and Amazon immediately sent out a replacement.  You just cannot beat Amazon for customer service.  With better sound this would be a 5 star.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Volfenstein
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the right price.  Using it for both TV and as a PC monitor.  Have the PC running from DVI to HDMI, looks great with Youtube and such.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Paul Teruel
Reviews.Content: Excellent HDTV and super fast delivery. I had not heard of oCosmo before I bought the TV, but that should not be a cause for concern. This TV has worked superbly!

Reviews.Title: It's got everything.
Reviews.Author: Thomas Camuso
Reviews.Content: PC, 3 HDMI, RCA, RGB, Roku (other media USB ready). I think the only problem with it is that it costs a lot to ship it.

Reviews.Title: We love this TV
Reviews.Author: mel
Reviews.Content: We were a little skeptical, because of the price and it being a brand we never heard of, but it's actually a great TV! Would definitely recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: GabiRP
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived on time and it has a great image quality. I would recommend it for everybody, specially if you are looking to save money and still purchase a high quality product.

Reviews.Title: For the price, can't be beat.
Reviews.Author: bclava730
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV around December 25th of 2013, its not Feb 25th and this TV has worked flawlessly.  The video and audio is great for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: elad255
Reviews.Content: I have a 50" Vizio that was much more expensive, and I have to say, this has a better picture!  Was very pleased with this purchase!  The only downfall is the sound leaves something to be desired, very "canned" sounding.  Doesn't bother me as it is the bedroom TV but if it really bothered me it wouldn't be anything to hookup a soundbar/some speakers. Very pleased with this purchase

Reviews.Title: TV REVIEW
Reviews.Author: Jerome S. Mays
Reviews.Content: I had never heard of this brand before, but for the price I decided to buy it. This tv is great. It displays a great pictures just like the known brand tv's and its roku ready which was a bonus for me. I would recommend this tv to anyone on a budget who is looking to get a bang for their buck.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for Low Price
Reviews.Author: Travis Johnson
Reviews.Content: Bought the TV during cyber monday havent had any issues. Plus the Roku 3 streaming stick works perfectly with it.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME picture!
Reviews.Author: Steph
Reviews.Content: I love my new t.v. purchased this on Cyber Monday and got an awesome deal. I had never heard off this brand but decided to buy anyways since this was just a t.v. for my bedroom, I am totally impressed,  sound & picture are really good. I've purchased a Google Chrome Cast for it & I LOVE it, instant smart t.v.!

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Majan68
Reviews.Content: I was a little Skeptical about this TV at first, so i did some research online and couldn't find anybody saying much bad about it.They said the picture was amazing.  and for 249 black friday deal i couldn't resist.  I bout it and was very surprised how good the picture looked, deep black vivid color.  i wanted a 120Hz TV but that is like 600 dollars.  I am not disapointed with 60 Hz.  Looks just fine.  Great TV, Been 4 months so far.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: "Richard" Dong yoon Lee
Reviews.Content: The sound is ok.The visual display, is alright. The ratio seems bit wide so face and legs seems to appear a little thick, but its not that bad.Still, the size is awesome.Considering its price, its a good deal to get 40 inch tv.

Reviews.Title: TV picture great for the price
Reviews.Author: T. Masek
Reviews.Content: The good:The picture of this TV is excellent with very warm colors.  The viewing angle is great as well.  We have this setup in our bedroom about 15 feet from our viewing location and I say you cannot beat this for the price.The Bad:The remote was DOA right out of the box, even after trying numerous pairs of good batteries.  I know the IR receiver in the TV is working as I was able to program my Dish network remote with the Sony code and can power on/off and change volume using that remote.  I have contacted oCosmo tech support with no response to date.The buttons on the right side of the TV are hooked up incorrectly to the board that controls them as they do not do what they are labeled.  The "MENU" button is volume down, "Input" is volume up, etc etc.  Not sure what can be done about that at this point, but the QA and build quality is not giving me a warm and fuzzy feeling.It has been almost a week after I unboxed this TV and contacted oCosmo about the DOA remote with no response.  Hopefully they get back to me at some point to resolve my issues.  Until that time my 3-star rating will stand.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, an even better bargain!
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: This is my first HDTV and I'm really impressed. If you get a chance to buy one of these, jump on it!

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Kjack
Reviews.Content: It was a great Christmas present for my family.The speakers and volume control are not great but easily fixed with an add-on speaker system.GREAT clean PICTURE!!!  Great price!!!

Reviews.Title: Amazing for the price.
Reviews.Author: breanna
Reviews.Content: First off, amazon verified purchaser here! Got this tv for Christmas when my husband and I switched bedrooms and became a lot farther from the 22 inch tv we had previously, making reading titles on Netflix rather tedious in bed. We also needed a tv for another room and it made sense to put the 22 inch in there. I'm very frugal however and was frustrated with the awesome deals on 32" TVs but nothing larger. Comparing the 22" and the 32" it wasn't much of an upgrade but a 40" for the price of a 32" seemed impossible, especially wanting 1080p and LED. I found one on Walmart.com and have discovered through reading endless amounts of reviews that this is the exact same TV for a little bit cheaper (at least in December it was) but with a different brand name.We are SO pleased and while we aren't tech snobs, literally everything else we own tech wise is name brand, a Vizio Smart TV in the living room, Apple computers and phones, Sony Bluray players etc, so we aren't used to second rate glitchy off brands and I was fairly nervous given that fact. I will say I am writing this review right now because I realized I had totally forgotten it was an off brand tv. It is that good. We have watched it every single night (an episode or 3 of MASH or something on Netflix each evening) since Christmas with zero issues. We hooked up a Bluray player and have Netflix and YouTube which look great on it.I also purchased a super cheap Cheetah Flush Tilt Mount from Amazon for incredibly cheap and although it took a lot of assembly, it is a great mount provided you assemble it well... Like Ikea furniture, it is only as good as the person who assembles it!

Reviews.Title: I bought two. One had a bad remote, but no other issues.
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Clear picture, good sound, love the built in roku controls. The setup was easy and it performs better than expected.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: Trainman
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV as a cheap TV for my exercise room. This TV works great with Chromecast, it's like a much more expensive TV for a far cheaper price. Picture is fairly good for the price. Sound is decent, but soundbar or other system is recommended if you really want good sound. Simple yet functional!

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: kerrie
Reviews.Content: nice tv what a great picture you get. the only thing my volume well not work with directv so i have to remotes

Reviews.Title: Quite Pleased
Reviews.Author: Michael Javier
Reviews.Content: Overall, I am very pleased with the quality of this TV.  This is my first "major" TV purchase, and my only criteria were that it needed to be in the neighborhood of $300, and needed to be greater-than-or-equal-to 40 inches.  I was a little skeptical of what kind of quality I'd be getting for such a low price from an unknown manufacturer, but I was pleasantly surprised.Upon arrival two months ago, the TV was pretty easy to set up.  The hardest part was the stand that took about 10 minutes.  I was impressed that all the accessories, manuals, and tools came individually wrapped in ziplock bags as opposed to the completely sealed plastic backs like I was expecting.  It even comes with it's own cleaning cloth.  The TV read all the channels from my digital antenna without missing a beat, and even picked up a couple that don't have any programming for some reason.So far, my only complaint is that the red/white audio jacks are shared for the component and composite video inputs.  So if you have two devices that you want to plug into the TV using those hookups, only one of them can have sound at a time.  Theoretically, this issue would take care of itself if I'd just switch my component video device to HDMI, but I digress...Despite the one minor issue, I am overwhelmingly satisfied with my oCOSMO TV.

Reviews.Title: Ocosmo
Reviews.Author: Kate
Reviews.Content: Looks good, assembly was easy, I don't have reason to complain. The volume is pretty loud. I can hear it perfectly from across the room on setting 1

Reviews.Title: great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Omer Ocak
Reviews.Content: When I see the price for this tv, i thought it will not be that good and rewievs are fake here.but i just tried my luck and bought this tv and now I reallylove it. great display, screen resolution, compatible with ps3, roku stick, chromecast. I haven't faced any bad issue for last 2 months.

Reviews.Title: Great t.v. for the price
Reviews.Author: footenote
Reviews.Content: Picture is great.  For the price, you can't beat it!  Got the extended warranty... just in case!  So far, so good!

Reviews.Title: a 40", 1080p SLIM tv for under $300!!! (got mine for alot less on Black Friday)
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Of course this isn't going to look as sweat as a Samsung model, cheapest model i can find for Samsung will run you $350+.However with that being said, its great!Bought this for my sister who wanted a bigger tv, and she is extremely happy vs her old tube HDTV.  Plays some content from USB (Jpegs & MP4's), and its Energy Efficient!  (if you care about that kind of stuff).If your one a budget, or you need to put a tv in a room that gets little traffic, consider this model.  Not to mention that because this is a ridiculously cheap tv, you can purchase an extended warranty for pennies incase it craps out on you .

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Martinez
Reviews.Content: Great picture, great sound, but this brand does not allow for a Disneyworld remote to be programmed to it.  We have to use the TV remote for the on/off, volume, TV setting, and the Dish remote for the channels.

Reviews.Title: I like it!
Reviews.Author: Math Mom
Reviews.Content: We needed another tv and this one fit the bill. It is light, so easy for me to set up and move, and it is sturdy. The picture is fine and we enjoy it. I've got no complaints for the price; I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: good HDTV
Reviews.Author: zelong you
Reviews.Content: just one word good, it could be move side and you can see it in different area. it is a good design.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: Sally TImm
Reviews.Content: Good TV for the price. I bought it for my husband for Christmas. Sound is good and I received the remote with the TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price!
Reviews.Author: R. Finley "Becky1234"
Reviews.Content: We're very happy with our new oCosmo 40" TV we got for the bedroom.  I'll agree with others that the sound is not the greatest, but we have a Sound Bar with a Subwoofer and all is wonderful.  When I purchased the TV I also took a chance on purchasing a Roku Stick, since the TV is Roku Ready.  We are extremely pleased with that too!  The two together were a few of the very best purchases I made for our home in 2013, no regrets!

Reviews.Title: Promppt shipment, works great
Reviews.Author: baddawgg
Reviews.Content: Although I never heard of oCOSMO before, the product is top quality. I really like the product. My only complaint is that it was shipped in a box that displayed its content. This would make it more likely to get stolen if I was not home to receive it

Reviews.Title: I was surprised
Reviews.Author: Michael Wilde
Reviews.Content: I got this for my son for Christmas.  Other reviews are correct when they say that it takes a little tweaking to dial the picture in.  My teenaged son figured it out and is using it for video games.  He was quite impressed with the picture once he got it adjusted to his satisfaction.

Reviews.Title: oCOSMO CE4001 40-inch
Reviews.Author: Pernell McCoy
Reviews.Content: The overall quality of product has proven to be excellent. The sight, sound and picture quality of the television exceeds my expectation.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Andrew Faber
Reviews.Content: TV is as good as any that I saw.  Saw a complaint about sound my sound is really good for any tv.  Especially for the cost.  Weary about the brand name but can't fin a lower cost for a tv.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Rose
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift for my grandchildren.  They say it has a wonderful picture and they like it very much!

Reviews.Title: more than expected
Reviews.Author: gary lotterman
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tv as it got pretty good reviews and looked especially good 'for the money'. Far exceded expectations. Easy set up. Great pic. sooo , so far so good.

Reviews.Title: Wow, nice 40 inch tv
Reviews.Author: Philip Richmond
Reviews.Content: I just got it for couple of days and no problems with it so far. I had a old heavy 32 inch tube console TV in the living and I replaced it just because I want to use hdmi plug in for my android phone and tablet. It has 3 hdmi ports. So nice and clear screen to look at. I don't know about the sounds which I am deaf.

Reviews.Title: Great Televsion
Reviews.Author: Thomas
Reviews.Content: This TV is awesome I really love it the picture quality is great and for the price it is basically a steal!!

Reviews.Title: good value for the price
Reviews.Author: GLDavis
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV to replace an older  CRT in our family room.  Very pleased with the quality and sharpness of the picture. The only problem was finding the codes for My Direct TV remote.  The use of Sony remote codes should be more prominent in the manual.  other than that it seems to be working well.

Reviews.Title: Very Impressed
Reviews.Author: michelle1970
Reviews.Content: I ordrered this tv as a Christmas gift for my daughter..( received tv in 3days on standard delivery)she wanted a big screen &I; searched all over &couldn;'t find anything close to this price!I was skeptical about the brandname but read other reciews &have; to say I'm very impressed with the tv...the picture is great&but; u do need to adjust picture which was very easy..the base needs to be screwed on but that was also simple!my daughter loves the tv &I; believe this is a steal for the price!

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Freckledblackman
Reviews.Content: Great TV,  at 100 dollars more than its price it would still be a good deal. Speakers aren't great but good enough

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: H Pokeus
Reviews.Content: So far, so good. I am very impressed with the quality of the picture of this television, especially considering what I spent for it. It has exceeded my expectations thus far. The picture rivals the Samsung that this replaced (I moved the Samsung to the bedroom).Also, I was impressed by the customer service; the remote that came with the television did not work out of the box. I called the number to let them know, and a replacement remote was in my mailbox less than a week later. The only complaint that I would have is that the remote does feel a little cheap and flimsy, but I use a Universal remote anyways so it's really not that big of an issue for me. I would be worried about the durability if I had to use the remote on a daily basis, though. But in the grand scheme of things, not a big deal at all.

Reviews.Title: Great value.
Reviews.Author: Bogie777
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift.  Nothing negative at all.  You can spend a lot more money for just a few more bugles and whistles.

Reviews.Title: Looks Great!
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Lopez
Reviews.Content: It has beautiful picture for the price, works as expected, and I'm very happy with my purchase.(Bought it on sale)

Reviews.Title: Cheap TV
Reviews.Author: Roman Migowski
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV thinking that I was taking a risk. This TV is great all round.For the price it has everything that other tv 's have that cost double!!No complaints great picture.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Sabrina F.
Reviews.Content: This TV was easy to install and has a good picture. For the price its a great deal. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Shocked
Reviews.Author: James Lunde
Reviews.Content: I have a 50in SONY next to it and the color is no different.Best buy for the buck when it comes to TV's.If you have Playstation or another gaming system you don't even needthe Roku to surf the web.

Reviews.Title: Great image, soso sound
Reviews.Author: GigiGramercyGirl
Reviews.Content: A great deal. Just make sure you have another speaker system because the sound isn't great at all. Adequate at best, but totally fixable with a sound box or separate surround sound speaker system.Not a super smart computer, but you can't beat the price and the picture is great. Nice thin frame as well so it doesn't take up much room for a nice sized tv. (I don't mind the black frame, but would have been nicer if it was a dull finish.)(Has 3 usb ports.)

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: MERH130
Reviews.Content: great loves it. love price perfect buy. this tv is awesome. works great. has so many different options. was easy to purchase

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Hixie Cruz
Reviews.Content: I cant believe what answesome product for such a low price. It arrived fast. I purchased it as a gift for my sons new apartment. He loved it and the picture is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Great television for the price
Reviews.Author: momof2whohasadog
Reviews.Content: This television was well worth the price.  I would definitely recommend it to someone who was looking for a good deal.

Reviews.Title: The television is awesome.
Reviews.Author: James E .Smith
Reviews.Content: I got this television for my daughter for Christmas. I got it on cyber Monday for $265, and it is a very good television. Currently hoping to find another one. The TV comes with a lot of connection formats for external equipment. The picture quality was excellent considering the price. I see people comment on the sound quality but it sounds good especially for a teen. I just purchase her a oCOSMO sound bar and it not only sounds goods her remote has control for it. Perfect all around television, and for the price you can't beat it. I would purchase again.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: kory barton
Reviews.Content: A Great tv at a great price! Usually don't trust brand I don't hear of buy this one works great.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Denise
Reviews.Content: Got this for our mom for Christmas.  Picture is great and pretty easy to set up.  Really like this TV.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: Never heard if this type of tv before and when shopping for the price I always say u get what u pay for but this tv turned out to be a very nice one the picture is awesome !!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Resolution!
Reviews.Author: Glory
Reviews.Content: COsmo arrived on time and was a very simple setup.  The picture is vibrant and clear.  Beautiful HD resolution.  We couldn't be happier with this purchase.Glory

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Sydnie Barcenas
Reviews.Content: I wasn't expecting much when I ordered this tv on Black Monday for just over $200.  Happier with this tv versus my $1500 Panasonic.  Picture is great and love the swivel, though I plan to wall mount it soon.  Glad I bought it for mom.

Reviews.Title: SEEING IS BELIEVING!
Reviews.Author: aswtsnd
Reviews.Content: This TV will exceed your expectations.  Holds it own when compared to others costing much more.  Picture quality, ease of set-up and very competitive price make it an unbeatable value.

Reviews.Title: very good tv over all
Reviews.Author: Anamaria
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv on cyber monday and it was only 250, It was at my house in three days and nothing was missing, Its not a common brand so I skeptical at first but the quality it really good and the sound is good as well so I am very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: VALUE for money
Reviews.Author: Max Daniel
Reviews.Content: I got this on sale for 250 bucks, after shipping and tariffs it was about 300 by the time i got it to my place in Vancouver. The TV looks great, tiny bezel looks like brushed metal. The colours aren't as vibrant as the screen on your phone, but that's not really a fair comparison. Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Guy M. Heminway
Reviews.Content: Received the set before Christmas in a timely manner. My son did the research on this set since I  have never heard of this brand and he recommended it. Gave it to my daughter for Christmas and she lives in a different town so she set it up herself and loves it. I haven't seen it yet that is why I only gave it 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: quality
Reviews.Author: Blaine Bordelon
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed with the picture quality. I would recommend this hdtv to anyone. I've bought two of these for my kids and plan on buying another one for myself.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: winmaster
Reviews.Content: This display is excellent for the price I paid ($250 for Cyber Monday 2013). While it has definite contrast issues, the overall picture quality is acceptable. The remote is also more responsive than those found with other cheap models. In fact, many of the issues that cheap TV's often have are not present in this model. Overall, while a videophile would not be satisfied with this display, it is fine for a secondary TV or if you cannot afford a Tier-1 or 2 model.

Reviews.Title: Better than I expected
Reviews.Author: drvogelpohl
Reviews.Content: This TV was such a great value.  I purchased the roku streaming stick to use with it and I'm very happy with the streaming video service using the MHL interface that comes with this tv.  Picture and performance is beyond what I expected.  Would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: TV Initial Presentation is Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Stella Garcia "Blanca"
Reviews.Content: Once I turn it on even with my cable carrier and HD box the picture is just about normal but not half as good as my 40 inch LG in my other room.  I works, it has a nice loud sound so I can hear it over my treadmill and it was very easy to fit on a mounting bracket.  It is very light, and for the price?  I got what I paid for.  I did buy the added TV protection plan and haven't had to use it.  It does sound kind of "limp" but my TV was at the price I could afford.

Reviews.Title: Good price, great quality.
Reviews.Author: Judy Neigel
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture, color and clarity meets and exceeds my expectation. The price was in my range and I took a gamble on the quality and am pleased with the product.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: peter berenz
Reviews.Content: This TV has everything and more than you can expect especially for the price.  I paid $249.00 Since I live in the Phoenix area it was at my door in 2 days...free shipping.  Works and looks great.  Also Roku ready.  Found a  refurbished Roku for $39,  netflix for $7/mo  Makes it wifi ready.  What else is needed.  Great size for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Michael Lee
Reviews.Content: picture is clear and bright with a Blue-ray playing, with no noticeable blur.  I do not have a game console hooked up to this TV, so keep searching for reviews if that's its intended purpose.  The cons are typical for this price point:  it does not handle black as well as my nicer monitors, and you will notice when there is no active input the black screen is blotchy. Also, oCosmo is clearly trying to create some brand recognition so you will be treated to their logo for a second or two upon power-up to compensate for the extremely competitive price.  Neither of these are reason enough to avoid this otherwise perfectly functional TV.

Reviews.Title: Nice tv
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: The tv is large and looks great. When I bought it, it was $250 which was a fantastic price for the size and quality. I works with Roku, however I have not actually tried out that function.

Reviews.Title: Pretty awesome picture for a very affordable price
Reviews.Author: Rosalie Knoll
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a 46-inch television screen but were dismayed at the prices.  We came across this on Amazon and looked at the reviews.  Also, we looked at the ports for accessory devices and decided to give it a try.  We are very pleased with the quality of the picture and ability to plug in all the essential devices needed for our sound system.  The built-in sound speaker is not great but adequate, although we prefer to run this through our sound system which worked out beautifully for us.  All in all, great product for the price.  Now we will see how long it lasts without trouble.

Reviews.Title: great quality @ a great price
Reviews.Author: Rodney Rideau
Reviews.Content: Great tv for the price. The HD channels over coax from the cable company without a receiver was amazing. Just goes to show how much the name brand tvs are overpriced.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied with my tv
Reviews.Author: Kylie M.
Reviews.Content: The tv arrived in two days, as promised. All of the pieces were included, even batteries for the remote and a screwdriver to assemble the stand. It was very easy to put together; I was able to do it by myself. The picture quality is great for the price. Others complained of poor sounf quality, but I think it is fine. I would definitely recommend this product, especially at this unbeatable price.

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: james j lesinski
Reviews.Content: for the price, its quite good, but lets see how long it will last, sofar one month in, it still works.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Cary Stickles
Reviews.Content: Got this tv on cyber week.  great tv with great picture. not to mention an amazing price.  very good tv for under $400

Reviews.Title: I LOVE THIS TV.
Reviews.Author: LYNN
Reviews.Content: This is the best tv I ever owned. I bought it in cyber sale  for 249.00 after  reading several positive reviews on it The pictures are vivid and large.  This is my first 40 inch screen tv. I was sceptical at first, mainly because of the price and because I do not reside in the us. It was shipped to my freight forwarder in Florida who sent it to me. I had some help setting  it up.  We followed the direction in one review to get the best picture.  I  am really happy with  the purchase. I did not purchase any warranty,so I am counting on good luck.

Reviews.Title: Purchased for $250, great value for price
Reviews.Author: Angelo N. Collins "AngeloCollins"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this during their black Friday sale.  I've had no issues with the tv as of yet, been using it just about every day since November.  I like that it has 3 hdmi ports, and that it can swivel from the base about 90 degrees or so.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely no regrets, but I do recommend a minor external speaker mod...
Reviews.Author: David H.
Reviews.Content: Much better quality than one would expect overall.  Excellent picture and great audio (only when using external speakers), the built-in speakers are an embarrassment to the audio circuitry that was included.  The nice EQ and SRS settings are severely restrained by the crappy internal speakers.  This is not to fault this tv in particular, all modern thin flat screens have bad audio from speakers pointing down or backwards.What I did was remove the back panel, disconnected the wires from the built-in speakers, added about 4 feet of wire to them, and hooked them up to a pair of nice quality HiFi bookshelf speakers.  Incredible difference.  You won't need a sound bar if you do this.  Just be sure you have the electronics skill to do this mod safely, or find someone who can.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture!
Reviews.Author: Jean Landis
Reviews.Content: Sound could be improved some.  Only problem is that Direct TV satellite service cannot program the universal remote for oCOSMO, so takes two remotes to operate the TV.

Reviews.Title: What a deal!
Reviews.Author: Shaun
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tv with skepticism, but it was cheaper than i could find used.  I went ahead and ordered because of the one year warranty. I have found this to be an excellent buy!  The color and picture quality is fantastic, it's very light weight and the picture doesn't fade when viewed on any angle.  I saw a-lot of "warning" ratings for this product... but as far as i'm concerned they are not legit unless they actually bought and tried the product.  Looking forward to seeing more from ocozmo... Vizio started in much the same way after all... better get one while they're cheap.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: broncosfan "broncosfan"
Reviews.Content: I got it for $249 (is it really going for $400 now????)  Not sure I'd pay $400 for an "off brand" TV but the $250 price tag made me take the leap and with the positive reviews - I thought I couldn't go wrong - and I didnt.  This is a great TV - my daughter even took it out of the box and set it up herself.  Great picture, good sound, plays the Wii - that's all I was looking for.  But my daughter did clean the screen with something and now its smeary - anyone know how I can fix this??????  I started cleaning it with one of those cloths you get with your iphone but its barely the size of a credit card and I can't get any where with something that small.  Anyhow - Great TV for the price I paid.  I have had it for about 3 weeks - I was going to order another for my room - maybe the 32" - I hope the price didn't increase that much with those - not understanding the increase in the price???

Reviews.Title: Great TV and Picture
Reviews.Author: Jason E.
Reviews.Content: Have had this tv for almost a month now and all I can say is WOW! Picture is perfect. Sounds is perfect. I will be buying some more. Thanks

Reviews.Title: I love this TV!
Reviews.Author: law3165
Reviews.Content: I got this as a Christmas present and absolutely love it.  Great picture, great features,  great size for my bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad price
Reviews.Author: Jazzman
Reviews.Content: The TV is not that bad for the price.  Need to adjust the volume and picture but for the price you cannot beat.  Easy to set up and with Google Chrome cast it works fine.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: mp
Reviews.Content: Okay, this is my third review of this TV. First, it was a good review, then it was a bad review, and now it is a GREAT review. Don`t worry, I`m not bi-polar, let me explain.I bought this TV on Dec 1 (Sunday) and received it on Dec 3 (Monday) with FREE shipping option. The box was light weight and I was able to carry it upstairs and put it together myself. I`m a woman :) (This was my first good review) The box it came on made it look like I was going to have an amazing picture but I did not, at first. This is where my bad review came in. The picture was so dark and sometimes had static. My old box TV that I replaced did not. However, about 3 days later, I played Black Ops II on it and the picture was far more clear than my old box TV. The TV was not good quality still no matter how much I played with the settings. Well, one day I was playing with the settings and I came across the add/delete channel option. So I clicked it. Now, I have basic cable and an old box TV so I only had up to channel 79. So I started deleting channels 80 and up. Then I realized there were channels like, 112-1, 112-2, 112-27 and I was like what in the world? So I just kept on checking them for the delete/skip list. My husband came in and asked why I am deleting all the good channels? (He doesn`t watch TV when I am home because it is "my" TV, he has his own but enjoys mine. (It`s bigger) so when I am home, I`m the only one who watches the TV in the room. I was like how are these good channels I don`t even have these channels? Well, I know nothing about digital TV, I live in the simple days, lol. He showed me all of these channels, all of my favorite channels and they were crystal clear. I was like, ahh man this is amazing. So now I watch these weird channels like 212-65 and I love them. The picture, and best of all, old channels that I don`t have on basic cable such as Centric, GSN, OWN, Lifetime Movie Network. Yet, I`m still paying for BASIC cable while getting hundreds of channels. I do enjoy this TV. My initial bad review was because I`m not quite TV smart. Until now, I only watched about 6 channels. Now I watch over 30 different channels. A+ to this affordable and quality TV and A+ to digital channels & all that other tech. stuff :) Happy holidas.

Reviews.Title: Great picture for a great price!
Reviews.Author: W Schmidt "Bill"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to replace a 32" name brand LCD in the Master Bedroom.  Very impressed with this set!  It's thin, light and looks very good on the wall mount.  The picture is clear, vibrant and has very good contrast / black levels right out of the box.  The picture will only improve after calibration with Digital Video Essentials HD.Don't be afraid of the off-brand name on this set.  For a budget HD TV, you can't beat it.  Very happy with the quality!

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: Bushai
Reviews.Content: this tv is great! i got it before the price went up but still its great. it has a nice looking thin frame and great with netflix and hulu. its super good with color on games. my ps4 and xbox one look great and so do my ps3 and 360. great TV.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Kikicat
Reviews.Content: Great deal at $249 and works as well as more expensive models. Sound is good enough for me and the picture, after a little playing around with the settings, is nice and crisp. TV is really light and I like the swiveling base.  I would highly recommend the brand and will definitely keep oCosmo in mind for future TV purchases.

Reviews.Title: Good Value for thr Money
Reviews.Author: Marylen Osler
Reviews.Content: The picture is clear and sharp. The sound is good and the TV is very light which made it easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Amazing tv, couldn't be happier.
Reviews.Author: Average Consumer
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for $249.00 and I was skeptical at the quality because of how cheap it was. It arrived very quickly, and everything that should have been in the box, was. I easily assembled the base and plugged it in. It looked sort of small on the ground as i put it together, but as soon as I put it on my entertainment center, it suddenly became HUGE. This tv is nice, I read some reviews on here saying the speakers are "tinny" but I have not had any problems with that, even with the volume up a lot. The colors really are very vibrant, which is great. The included swivel base, is amazing. It works easily and smoothly. it has 3 HDMI ports, 1 usb port, and the cord is 3 pronged. The remote is great, very light and thin, and not so small that you loose it constantly. It has all normal remote control functions, but it has roku controls and soundbar controls all in one remote. Really handy. The packaging was great, kept the tv protected well. The remote takes 2 AAA's the batteries are included. You also get a nice sized cleaning cloth, which is really just a nice touch to an already great tv.IN CONCLUSION: I AM REALLY HAPPY WITH THIS TV. COLORS ARE VIBRANT, SOUND IS GOOD (NOT TINNY) THE PRICE IS SO CHEAP, YOU CANT REALLY GO WRONG!

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: E. Xixis
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV because I thought it was a good price. I am impressed by the quality! Good picture and sound. Easy to set up and use. Comes with a screwdriver to attach the base. I don't use any of the internet related functions (Roku), so I can't comment on that. I would recommend this for sure. If any problems arise, I'll be back to edit my review, but so far I'm very pleased with this unit.

Reviews.Title: oCOSMO 40 inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV Thanks Santa
Reviews.Author: bigdeal
Reviews.Content: I bought this for myself, because I wanted a huge tv in my bedroom since I am going blind and also because I thought the price was a misprint.  I actually felt like I was stealing this thing.  Then I began to worry while waiting for it to arrive.  Its gonna look terrible, fuzzy pic, no features or just not work.  Boy was I wrong to worry.  This TV (never ever heard of this off brand) looks sharp. Setting it up to cable was one of the easiest tv's I have ever done.  I even mounted the darn thing on my wall within ten minutes!  The colors are vibrant, bright, sharp and clear.  The picture doesn't do that wonky thing like disappear if your head is tilted just so.  It even comes with a free Roku membership, which I didn't do but seems simple enough as it is just a usb plug and play.  The TV has all the features you need....sleep, recall, menu you know all the basics.  There isn't anything fancy like PIP but my other TV has that and I have never even used it.  I just could not be happier with this purchase and I don't think anyone would be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: package came very quickly
Reviews.Author: TSS
Reviews.Content: package came very quickly and everything was in good standing.  Works well.  Volume/sound seems odd, but everyone else in my family thinks it's fine.

Reviews.Title: excellent price and quality!
Reviews.Author: Rachelle Phipps
Reviews.Content: Love the color and picture. The price is unbeatable.. Bought a similar size but more expensive brand and the Cosmo has the better picture...

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Andrew Verch
Reviews.Content: Picture and sound quality is great, very thin and light weight, remote is easy to use, comparable tvs are twice the price

Reviews.Title: Great price, very good quality
Reviews.Author: Dani and Jimmy
Reviews.Content: To start off with, for a 40 in 1080p quality HDTV, the price was unbeatable. We bought it on or shortly after Cyber Monday, and got it for about $250. Compare that with $400+++ for other similar models. The visual quality is just great, DVDs and BluRays look fantastic on it. Unbeatable quality for the price.The knock I've heard about this TV was on the speakers. I'm listening to Pandora through the BluRay player right this minute on the TV speakers. One can't really say anything too scathing about the speakers; They are TV SPEAKERS. If you're looking for superior sound quality, you will either need to pay much more for a TV with a more impressive audio package, buy a sound bar or play audio through another speaker system. As a TELEVISION, this is great. Speakers work just fine for me. If/when I decide I want more, I will purchase and hook up a sound bar or surround sound system.

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: CHAD H COLE
Reviews.Content: No one can believe we paid just $250 for this baby. The resolution is great. We have it hooked up to our computer, so it doubles as a monitor. The computer wallpaper is of pictures we have taken of Idaho back country. Sometimes, as we walk through our living room, we have to just stop and stare at the beauty that is on the monitor.

Reviews.Title: I love this tv!!
Reviews.Author: Tara
Reviews.Content: Love it. Shows great. Love the lower price. Very happy!! Fast Delivery. I glad I didn't have to get a high price name brand the same quality.

Reviews.Title: Works great out of the box
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: The sound quality - as noted on other reviews - is not the best.  Cured with a add on surround system / or a sound bar.  Picture was great out of the box, and quite pleased with the purchase - especially when you consider the price.Wall mounted my unit, an the TV has 4 mounting "nuts" embedded in the back.  Again, worked just fine.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: J's Alpacas
Reviews.Content: I am watching what I want when I feel like seeing it. I can enjoy the picture and really appreciated the light weight and of course the EASY streaming stick. No more extra components needed; clean.

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Goodwin
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my mother to replace a Vizio I bought her about 5yrs ago which turned out to be awful and paid more for it than this one. This is also a larger size.  So far this is a great tv, picture and sound are really good. And it was easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Good value bad sound
Reviews.Author: gelrod
Reviews.Content: Sound quality is bad. Not a deal killer for me with sound system. Picture good. Price good. All of my existing boxes were easily connected in access able points

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Fred
Reviews.Content: Great image. Sound is not particularly great but overall, for the price, Im pretty amazed by this TV. Would buy again. Recommend.

Reviews.Title: Excellent slim tv!
Reviews.Author: Danny "Danny"
Reviews.Content: Tv is incredibly slim. Watching tv now is better than before because of its sharp picture and slim sleek look. It was very cost effective for this brand and size. It does it job by providing excellent picture and sound for viewers. Go for this tv if you dont care about brand and want to have a good experience watching tv.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Shane Walker
Reviews.Content: So nice I bought another one, slightly larger two weeks later.  Sound isn't great but I knew that going in.  Picture quality very good especially at the price.

Reviews.Title: No bells and whistles, but no high price tag either.
Reviews.Author: E. Hill
Reviews.Content: We've only had this TV for a few weeks, but so far so good. It's nothing special. However, the color is good, and the sound is acceptable. And that's on a 40 inch HDTV that cost less than $300.00. No bells and whistles, but no high price tag either. So far I'm loving it.

Reviews.Title: Great value here
Reviews.Author: decleboy
Reviews.Content: Not dissapointing at all. Great picture and light weight. Audio not the greatest and no aux audio out, only rca.reccomend you get a soundbar with rca connection or converter cable. Overall exellent product and super affordable. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: great quality at a small price
Reviews.Author: E. Nathan "Zen Knitter"
Reviews.Content: Super happy with my purchase.  I added a Roku stick and now it works great!  Picture quality is amazing, and setup is very easy.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal and Beautiful Picture
Reviews.Author: Jones-STL
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV on Black Monday and it arrived just 2 days later - Amazon has amazing service.  The packaging was done well - no damage in shipping - it had some nice soft foam blocks around all corners of the screen.  Assemble instructions were clear and simple - all you had to do was attach the stand.  All parts were supplied.I researched many other brands and settled on this one.  I had never heard of the manufacturer, but the ratings and comments were good so I took a chance.  The Amazon price was the right combination with the picture size and features for me.  It's not my primary TV, so I didn't want to spend too much.  The set does NOT come with an HDMI cable, so plan to get one if you don't have a spare - it makes a tremendous difference.  With only the usual amount of set-up (with easy to follow manual), the picture is great.You will not be disappointed with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price!
Reviews.Author: ctbeachbm
Reviews.Content: I've only had this TV for 24 hours, but wow, what a nice TV for such a great price!  It was very easy to set up out of the box and took me only about 30 minutes to set up.  The directions are very easy to follow and they even include a small screw driver to put the TV on its platform.  I can't wait to see some movies on it, but even basic cable non HD channels look great!

Reviews.Title: Great purchase, you DEFINITELY will NOT REGRET your purchase...
Reviews.Author: JBrew
Reviews.Content: Bought this after reading many of the reviews.  This TV arrived in great shape, had all the accessories, it was packed securely and professionally and the base installed very simply.  There was plenty of plastic protecting the screen and the two labels on the screen were very easily removed. I never adjusted the picture, Cox is my HD cable provider, and I can almost tell ZERO difference in the quality of my newer Samsung and the Ocosmo.  The sound is more then adequate in my own opinion.  If you are not allowing yourself to buy because of the brand name, then you are missing a great deal.  I would easily purchase this again and have recommended this two many friends (although it seems to be out of stock now). The only gripe I have, is that the box says to keep all packaging material and materials in case warranty service is needed.

Reviews.Title: Very Good TV
Reviews.Author: senz
Reviews.Content: This TV is great for the price. The picture and sound are solid. However, mine came with a few dead and stuck pixels. It's not even noticeable unless your really close to the TV looking for that type of thing. All in all, I definitely recommend buying this TV.

Reviews.Title: Awsome for the price!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: great picture for the price. Even the the brushed style bezel was a nice touch. i really like the new tech built into the TV!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: AlanG
Reviews.Content: Excellent value for the money. Well packaged and easy to set up. Looks much more expensive than it actually cost.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Adam Lloyd
Reviews.Content: Good TV especially for the price. The only complaint I have is that it took me a while to find out that they use Sony Remote codes for universal remotes (like the one for my HD cable box) Wish that was in the quick start guide.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Like a lot of people, I was a little skeptical of a brand I had never heard of, but decided to give it a shot since it was such a good price.So far I'm pretty pleased. It's not the best picture, as some people have said. I definitely wouldn't have put it up again the $800 TV or whatever people were saying. My 5 year old LCD seems to have a slightly better picture.But for $250, it's more than I expected, so overall I'm happy with the purchase at this point.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money !!!
Reviews.Author: David Einhorn
Reviews.Content: Needed to replace a set and didn't want to spend too much, saw the Amazon price of $249 read the positive reviews, did a little research as who as ever heard of Ocosmo decided to finally get a Amazon credit card to get an additional $50 off and presto a $200. 40 inch LED set arrived.I can't say enough positive things about this set so far, very good picture. Sounds pretty good, thin design, MHL port ....best $200 I've spent in a long while. Sure wish they made a 60" plus size and I would replace my DLP set in the family room..  I would not hesitate to buy another and certainly recommend this set to anyone looking for a low end LED set.

Reviews.Title: Love IT
Reviews.Author: Nancy L Kuehl
Reviews.Content: This TV just arrived yesterday and so far I am VERY impressed.  The picture is clear and crisp with bright colors.  The picture has the quality of TVs that are three times the price.  Most reviews say "for the price, this is a good TV", I would say this is a good TV regardless of the price.  I would absolutely recommend!

Reviews.Title: VERY NICE!!!
Reviews.Author: Dean
Reviews.Content: Worth the $250 i got it for. like everyone says, the 1080p is clear, the sound is very good, and the build is maybe below average and a little flimsy. but that doesnt affect how it plays

Reviews.Title: Great as a secondary TV
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Dewitt
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV recently for my office and have run it through the gauntlet, it's performing very well for the price. The contrast could be better, and some of the presets are overly saturated, but neither of those are surprising. The functionality of the TV is pretty basic compared to what I'm used to, menus feel a little lacking, but it isn't missing anything important. Haven't discovered if I you can unlock any service menus for more settings yet.My main hesitation after purchase was a long review here that mentioned a lot of ghosting and input lag. I'm happy to report that I have no such lag when using the screen as a second monitor to my MBP, using Mini DisplayPort to HDMI. My assumption is that he didn't turn off things like dynamic contrast and noise reduction, which I always turn off by default, but could be just a faulty panel. Biggest issue now is with no-name sets like this it's hard to find good picture settings somewhere like AVSF.I have noticed on my cable channels that there is definitely some motion judder or pixelation in fast-movement areas. I didn't notice anything like this when I was gaming, so I am thinking it's more my cable signal and not the TV.TL;DR purchase was def. worth $249 would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the money
Reviews.Author: F. Anderson
Reviews.Content: Nice TV for the price, actually has more hookups than a 55 I recently bought, came in perfect shape and worked right out of the box, can't do much better than this for the money

Reviews.Title: Good set at a great price
Reviews.Author: Michael Dunton
Reviews.Content: I, like many others, were skeptical on getting a set from a company I've never heard of.  I can tell you that I have yet to be disappointed with the picture.  All HDMI ports work.  I have a Chromecast running through it along with a PS3 and streaming is seamless.  No dead pixels.  Only draw back I've experienced in the first week of ownership is the audio quality.  It seems as if there is a channel missing on the audio, regardless the source (component, HDMI, etc.).  When watching a basketball or football game, the crowd sounds like it is a mile away and I cannot hear the whistle when blown by the officials.  I have tinkered with the sound settings (am trying +8 on bass and +3 on treble as recommended from a previous review).  I highly recommend getting an external source for speakers.  I am running an old 2.1 Logitech speaker system right now and the difference is night and day, I can only imagine what a sound bar or surround sound would do.

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Becks
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV. The color is amazing, everything is clear, installation is quick and painless. Shipping came in a day early and my video games looks great on this screen. I have yet to try the Roku stick but I will update when I do

Reviews.Title: oCOSMO inch TV
Reviews.Author: kramer feasel
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is the best TV in my opinion. The picture quality is fantastic, it is a very sharp looking tv. I play ps3 on it and the picture quality of that is also very good. The only reason I did not rate this tv 5 stars was the remote. I could not program my Directv remote to the tv because oCosmo is not on the brand list, and the remote that comes with the tv just feels really cheap.This obviously is not a huge problem at all, and if I were to recommend a tv to anyone on a budget, this would be the one.Amazon was also very quick about delivery. I ordered it on a Sunday and received it on a Tuesday.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price paid.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: bought during cyber monday for $250, great value, great picture quality, combined it with Roku 3 player and mounted on wall of my workout room in my house, it's perfect.  As some others said, frame build quality isn't all that if you're looking for aesthetics, for my room, sound quality is fine.

Reviews.Title: BEST BLACK FRIDAY DEAL YET!
Reviews.Author: Tatiana
Reviews.Content: Purchased on black friday with prime for awesome free 2 day shipping. after reading the reviews i assumed the tv would be alright what i paid for but the tv is AMAZING. the picture is incredibly vivid and beautiful HMDI AND MHL ready. My tv did come with a remote and batteries the remote controls ROKU as well must purchase ROKU chip separately but definitely an AMAZING BUY SOOOOOO HAPPY!

Reviews.Title: oCosmo?  Made me laugh but I liked the price!
Reviews.Author: GnGB
Reviews.Content: This was a budget decision.  For $249. it is the best size tv for the price!  Yes...I have never heard of oCosmo and it kind of made me laugh to think about it but it has a pretty decent picture.  I am looking into a Roku Streaming Stick or a Google Chrome Cast for it but to be continued...  The colors are excellent with digital signals like dvds and streaming from BDs but since I have basic cable most things are in 480 instead of 1080.  But for the 1080 channels that I do get...pretty decent.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Joe C
Reviews.Content: I'm pretty impressed with this TV.  For $278, I wasn't expecting too much but the picture quality is pretty nice.  In HD the picture is really good, in SD it's ok.  The sound is fine.  There's nothing fancy about it, it's a basic TV but it does it well.  I also got the 32", but the picture quality isn't as good as the 40".  This is a great TV for the price.For the conspiracy theorists out there, I'm a verified purchaser and in no way associated with the company.For the skeptics, amazon has a liberal return policy and these LED TVs weigh next to nothing compared to older TVs.

Reviews.Title: Great Value!!
Reviews.Author: Brandy Jarvis
Reviews.Content: Overall a great TV at an unbelievable price.  Better picture quality than my 50'' Panasonic plasma I bought in 2010.  Cant go wrong with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv
Reviews.Author: josh
Reviews.Content: awesome tv. The picture is great. Might want to get a sound system, i currently have one, but the volume is not bad.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a low price!
Reviews.Author: J. Cole "JC"
Reviews.Content: I have no complaints about this TV, impressed with the picture and sound quality.  I mouted this in my basement from the ceiling.  Hard to believe you can get a 40 inch LED TV for $250 these days, outstanding quality.

Reviews.Title: $250 AND 3 HDMI ports?  Sold.
Reviews.Author: dvines@mindspring.com
Reviews.Content: Really should be 4-1/2 stars - my only fault with it is the (apparent) lack of discrete remote codes to change the inputs.  It is not in Harmony's database, so I had to teach mine most of the remote functions.I'm not going to comment on the picture, because I honestly probably wouldn't know good from terrible.  I will say that it looks just fine to me, and the speakers seem OK for a bedroom environment.  I would not use them for a family room set.The real thing here is the price AND the 3 HDMI inputs.  I was unable to find a similarly spec'd set for even $200 more.

Reviews.Title: Great Low Budget TV That Doesn't Skip on Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: Travis Kale
Reviews.Content: This TV is amazing for the price.  I have only had it for a short while so I don't know how well it will withstand the test of time but it seems to be sturdy and of quality.  The picture quality is just as good as my LG TV of the same size which was quite a bit more expensive.  There isn't any fancy smart TV features, but I would prefer just to add an external device to get smart TV like features anyhow.  I would buy again.

Reviews.Title: OCOSMO CE4001 40" LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: debby
Reviews.Content: Unplugged cables from a Samsung and put them right into oCOSMO ports.  Great picture, color and clarity.  Got the Roku streaming stick and hooked up in 5 minutes.  No wires!  Can very easily change cable to Roku on oCOSMO remote.  My 5 yr old Granddaughter learned it in 5 minutes.  I could not be Happier.  The panel does not emit a lot of heat.  I am very pleased. I also bought a 4 year Square Trade Warranty.  Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: This TV is the Truth! Bang for Buck!
Reviews.Author: DougStamper
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV on Thanksgiving morning and it shipped fast for the free shipping I chose. The picture in HD looks great, that is if you're truly watching an HD DVD, or watching channels broadcasted in HD. I'm not a TV expert, but I can say that this TV certainly sounds better than my SDTV, and that's really I can ask for out of this. I have a Roku 1 that shows up as 720p and it looks decent enough for the time being. If you wan't to make your TV smart, buy a Roku 3, or buy a blu ray player that streams things like Netflix and Amazon prime. I can't think of anything else to say besides the fact that I'm thankful and more than satisfied by oCosmo for selling a great quality tv for this price. I doubt any physical errors will happen to this computer until it's death and purchases the 3 year extended warranty just in case.Pros-  * Easy to set up and concise instruction manual  * Great value for simply watching television in HDCons-  * I can't think of any down sides about the TV that I didn't obviously expect (example: Lack of being a smart tv).

Reviews.Title: Excellent alternative to costly high price competitors
Reviews.Author: Macadocious
Reviews.Content: major bargain. The consumer reviews really sold me on t.v. Glad I listened. Picture quality on par with any major retailer, and comes Roku ready ( streaming stick, w/o remote, already incorporated in t.v. remote) Plenty of perks and options for the price. Now if they can come up wih some more good quality products to back this find up.

Reviews.Title: WOW.
Reviews.Author: MichaelH
Reviews.Content: So given the negative reviews, I was very leery to purchase this TV. Having confidence in Amazon that if I hated it I could return it, and that the price was reduced, I decided to give it a try. I was also intrigued by it having an MHL port (already have a roku and love it)Just received it. The box and strapping is intact without evidence of manhandling, with colorful and informative packaging.I will update once setup.UPDATE:Opened the box. Very nicely packaged with zip-lock bags for the parts inside (remote, batteries, manual, etc.)Hooked up an antenna and plugged it in. Selected the language and allowed it to auto detect my broadcast channels, and VOILA!WOW. Redunculous!!!!! Seriously, as of this moment, for $249 this TV is an OUTSTANDING value. The picture absolutely rivals sets costing hundreds more $$. The sound is at least as good as most other flat screens I have seen/heard. Obviously, if you want a theater experience, get some power, surround, and a sub-woofer.Bought the 3 year warranty - hopefully will never have to use it. Reliability will be the only thing that will detract from this purchase. SO glad I took the chance and went with this one instead of  leaving my Thanksgiving table and standing in line!!!

Reviews.Title: A Fantastic Value
Reviews.Author: Kilarney
Reviews.Content: Shipping was super-fast.  I ordered it on a Saturday and it arrived in my rural town on Monday.  Packaging was perfectly fine.  There were sturdy foam bumpers protecting the television, and it appeared to be quite safe and secure.  Assembly was super easy, with everything you need included right down to a screwdriver.  There are no cables included other than the power cord.  The remote is a little large and complex, but I am a fan of simple remotes.  There are several inputs, including RCA (for a Wii), HDMIx3, VGA, and component.The television is not nearly as heavy as I expected, especially compared to the old tube television that it replaced.  The picture is absolutely fine.  I've seen plenty of TVs in the stores, and I can't see how the picture on this set is any worse.  For the price, you really cannot beat this product.  I pity the people that pay hundreds of dollars more for a same size television.I only have one complaint: the lack of audio outputs.  There is no optical or HDMI out.  The best you are going to do is the orange s/pdif (coax) cable.  I had to return a sound bar because it did not even accept a coax input.  So be aware if you are purchasing components.As for the Roku ready, I got a much better deal on a box compared to the usb stick - so this feature really wasn't worth it to me.  I suppose the one benefit of the usb stick is that you do not need a power outlet for it.

Reviews.Title: Undependable Purchase
Reviews.Author: Marion Stanley
Reviews.Content: Great picture, however audio went out after 3 weeks just started clicking in the middle of a movie.  Would not purchase again.  Amazon was great with the return.

Reviews.Title: perfect for budget 9.75 out of 10
Reviews.Author: Delta9
Reviews.Content: Purchased this on the night of black Friday for the special price of $249 & opted for the free shipping.  Item arrived Tuesday before the wall mount in fact (ordered at the same time.)  Definitely HAVE TO adjust display & sound settings from factory! I also had to set my 360 console to 1080p as well.  That being completed the resolution of this TV is better than expected.  I give it a 9.75 out of ten all togetherI give it a 10.0 out of ten for price/ size/ shippingI give it a 9.50 out of ten for resolution & clarityI give it a 9.00 out of ten for sound qualityHaving had several LCD/ plasma TV's, I've succumb to the  conclusion, don't ever expect great sound from flat screen TV's.  That being said I don't think the sound is as bad as the reviews led me to believe.  Bass could definitely be louder as always  associated with flat screens, but does emit audio at an acceptable decibel.  Make sure to plug in everything before you mount it, or you will be struggeling.  Overall don't pay extra for fast shipping & GREAT BUY!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Jamison R McLean
Reviews.Content: This TV is an excellent product for the price. Picture and sound are both fine. Definitely worth the money! Arrived in great condition and was easy to setup, pretty much plug and play.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Vincent Hounshell
Reviews.Content: It looks great, sounds great, and was only $250. Saw a highly rated review about ghosting with a PC hooked up but they likely have the post-processing effect turned on. I turned all that off because I didn't see the point and mine looks great.

Reviews.Title: Hard to beat for the price!
Reviews.Author: OhioPop
Reviews.Content: Got this for the basement and it is sharp! Some complaints have been made about sound but it is absolutely fine, can easily be heard throughout a large room. Picture is really sharp, LED is LED. If you sat this next to another high end tv you might be able to see a difference but when would you ever do that? Set up was easy, very light easy to wall mount. This is a GREAT buy an outstanding value.

Reviews.Title: perfect so far
Reviews.Author: marco
Reviews.Content: the product seems great, i have had it for a few weeks now. Im not an expert on tbs, however i love it. The colors look great (blacks are black, whites are white,etc) its a perfect size. the remote control is a remote control (who uses the one it came with anyway) 3 hdmi ports perfect for my cable box and apple tv. roku remote built into the tv remote (i don't use roku)long story short. i love the tv and it was super cheap! i got the 4 year warranty just in case. i mean, why not?

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: KS
Reviews.Content: I've always been a name brand diva but with the economy the way it is I've had to do some cutbacks and stay home more often. Which brings me to buying a nice TV for my bedroom to enjoy. I love this tv. The quality is excellent and definitely comparable to $500-$800tv's. The colors are bright and the picture is super clear. I definitely recommend this TV.  My TV came with instructions, control remote, and stand accessories all brand new.  Plus the tv has hook ups for extra accessories to plug in. I have a flash drive kinds thing that connects it to apps that I can put on my smart phone and tablet.

Reviews.Title: Was on the fence but now I'm sold
Reviews.Author: KP
Reviews.Content: I was kinda worried at first that this tv might be junk considering its pretty cheap and off brand. Luckily I have found it to be a pretty awesome TV. I wanted a nice, fairly large but not super huge, upgrade from the TV I previously had and this works perfectly. Simple to set up, I just screwed on the stand, plugged it in and boom. I mainly got it to use with my PS3 so I can watch netflix in 1080p and use other video apps as well as play games and so far it seems to be working perfectly fine. I don't really care that its not a smart TV given that I already have a PS3 which does most of what those do anyways. Picture quality is awesome especially for the price, Ive seen name brand tvs around the same size or bigger with pictures way worse than this. Granted I did just get the tv today so I'm not sure about longevity yet. I'll update the review later if anything happens but hopefully I wont have to.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Junson
Reviews.Content: Love this TV, it's worth it for the price and it has a few more add on's. I wish i waited another day because the price dropped 30 bucks after I bought it. Other than that the TV works great, picture is awsome!

Reviews.Title: Best value for the money but be cautious if serious gamer
Reviews.Author: kingzoidberg
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic product and amazing buy. I snagged it during the cyber monday sales on it and it was only $250, but I would still shell out far more for this TV after using it for the past half year or so.The only thing you need to know before you buy this is if you plan on doing multiplayer split-screen gaming on this TV.  It is only 60Hz which means that say 4 person split-screen Call of Duty will lag considerably to the point where you won't want to use it. It works beautifully on single player games like Skyrim and even games like Borderlands 2 player split screen or 3 person split screen Little Big Planet Karting. It seems to become a problem with 4 player split screen games.Other than that it fantastic and highly recommend to all as long as you keep the above in mind. The colors are spectatular. The 1080p support in a 40 inch at this price is unheard of.  If you don't play on using it for 4 person split screen all the time, buy it now. You won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: oCOSMO 40 - inch LED TV - I'm a fan
Reviews.Author: POBOX7
