Reviews.Content: Honestly this TV is a great product especially considering the price.  This is my first LED TV and I have not been disapointed.  Just take the time to set up the picture and you are good to go.  I will say the sound isn't the best, but I've never been impressed with any TV's sound quality.  Do yourself a favor and pick up a 2.1 sound bar with the extra money you saved by purchasing this TV.I did not rate this TV a 5 start because it did not include an optical out for sound, which considering they included three HDMIs and a myriad of other video and sound out options, I felt this was oversight on the part of the manufacturer (especially considering that you'll want to upgrade the sound).If you're in the market for an affordable TV with a great picture (with a little setup) its hard to go against the oCOSMO.  Pair it with an extended warranty for extra piece of mind at this price point it won't break the bank to do so.

Reviews.Title: Looks good.
Reviews.Author: Caleb Abel
Reviews.Content: Looks very nice. Sounds pretty great. Played on a console with HDMI. It also has every port I need. Even output sound.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Quality TV
Reviews.Author: Megan
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with my purchase.  Picture quality is great. The sound took a bit to adjust to from our old tv but now I couldn't even tell there was a difference.  Love that there are 3 HDMI ports and that I can plug my Wii in too!  Also love that the frame around the tv is very thin.  maybe a half inch or less.

Reviews.Title: Great, for the price...
Reviews.Author: Tulsa Jim
Reviews.Content: Yes, it has pretty poor speakers.  But, other than that, the unit is solid and provides a great picture.  We use it every week in a nursery at church and it has performed perfectly for months.

Reviews.Title: Really a good deal for the price
Reviews.Author: SLB
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be happier with this TV. I ordered it after reading a lot of the reviews because I couldn't believe how cheap the price was. I figured, if it's no good, I can always send it back. Just to be on the safe side, I got the 3 year extended warranty for $20 extra.I've had it now since last November and haven't had any problems. I'm really happy with the picture quality and overall performance.

Reviews.Title: We like it
Reviews.Author: Fuefuepat
Reviews.Content: This TV is great, The picture is so clear and "BIG" that we seem to seeing detail. We are happy.

Reviews.Title: Awesome for the price!
Reviews.Author: Nancy E. Wall
Reviews.Content: My husband and I turned our garage into a giant playroom for our son.  He loves it and we enjoy waching him play, but now that we are spending a lot of time in the garage, we need something more to entertain adults.  With this tv we also bought a Chromecast and it is now so easy to connect the TV to our wireless.  We watch netflix, HBOGo, Hulu, amazon movies, etc!  The garage is now a much happier place for the whole family!Great Product!

Reviews.Title: Chill T.V. for your bedroom
Reviews.Author: Matthew Crowley
Reviews.Content: This is the perfectly sized T.V. to double up as a bedroom/lounge TV. I use it in my medium sized bedroom and it's plenty big. Picture is consistent from different viewing angles. Great deal.

Reviews.Title: Horrible, horrible, HORRIBLE audio.
Reviews.Author: Majtron
Reviews.Content: Maybe it's because this is my first flat-screen TV, or maybe it's because I'm an electronic musician, but the audio quality coming out of this thing is atrocious. I mean, so bad that it actually distracts you while you're watching it. Yes, I tried various connections and media sources. It's the speakers, they're bad...but it's also the built-in capability. It STILL sounded bad coming out of a standard sound bar that had 4 star ratings. You just can't get away from the muddy low-mid hollow sound no matter what you do to the EQ settings. It's the absolute worst I've heard since....I don't know, kid's toys 20 years ago? Seriously, don't bother to get this without understanding that you're going to spend extra on something that comes with a subwoofer. And don't expect a cheap sound bar will do the trick.OTHER THAN THAT! :) Decent TV, great picture and no trouble with it whatsoever. Remote is a bit gratuitous, kinda pointless if you're not using 5 other things that you can program to work with it.

Reviews.Title: Not the highest quality but for the price is awesome.
Reviews.Author: Citizen Snips
Reviews.Content: The TV is awesome for the price, it definitely isn't perfect though.  I have noticed severe ghosting, its extremely noticeable when there is black on white in the show. I have mainly noticed this on cartoon such as bobs burgers and futurama, the outlines of the characters when they move take a second to fade away but playing the ps4 on this TV it looks awesome and you can't see the ghosting at all. The sound quality is pretty bad, I completely disabled the audio and hooked up a Sony soundbar for all sound. Out of the box you'll want to play with the settings to get the best possible picture quality buts its really simple to do. I turned off all advanced features and left everything else stock except for the brightness and contrast which I put at brightness 55 and contrast at 30, it helped a lot with the picture. Overall the TV is definitely worth the price even with its ghosting issue. Would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Jermey Moore "Jermey Moore"
Reviews.Content: Great TV the picture is just as good as my 60" vizio (which is awesome!)Also the MHL port is awesome and runs the Roku stick great. Nice feature to have if you plan to suit it up with a Roku.The sound is ok, but nothing great. Don't expect superb sound from these budget tvs (or most any slim LEDTV)

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Nancy Burgin
Reviews.Content: We were nervouse purchasing a brand we had not used before but we are glad we did. The screen resolution is amazing. It turned out to be a great product for an affordable price!

Reviews.Title: Great picture bargain pricing
Reviews.Author: Christopher S Mock
Reviews.Content: If it wasn't for the Amazon reviews, I don't think we would have bought this.  Nowhere else on the internet can you find to many details on this tv.  But the reviews are spot on, it's a great tv.  It's no samsung, but for the price, picture quality is awesome. It does have some decent customizations and works great in the bedroom. If you can find this tv at the $250 mark, buy it.

Reviews.Title: Great deal, excellent quality
Reviews.Author: Garrett
Reviews.Content: This TV came with a few classy extras that others I've purchased did not. It had a proper stand and even included a screwdriver in the bag so you can throw it all together right from the box. The instructions actually made sense; the whole experience is very user friendly. I have this set up to run high definition movies through a Roku and I couldn't be more pleased with the picture quality. If you have a space that needs a "not-enormous" screen that looks top-notch, then this is an excellent deal for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at an awesome price!
Reviews.Author: H. Hernandez
Reviews.Content: The oCosmo 40-inch LED TV is amazing for the price; sharp 1080p image, beautiful looking slim design, and very lightweight, I was able to wall mount it by myself (with the right mount of course).  The only drawback is the sound, it is cheap, and not only the speakers but the card, you need a sound bar with a sub-woofer at the least, and even then it will not be amazing... but good to go.  I purchased a re-furbished Vizio 2.1 speaker set for $80 and it does the trick.  The MHL Roku feature is great if you want to save space (no extra box or cables), but you  miss out on the awesome Roku brand remote, and USB capability (see my separate review on the Roku Stick).  Overall this TV is a great purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great price!
Reviews.Author: NM
Reviews.Content: Bought this as "used" but I could not tell the difference. This picture is awesome but the sound is not so great, but for the price I can live with it.

Reviews.Title: Ocosmo 40 inch TV
Reviews.Author: janecurran
Reviews.Content: I love my new 40" t.v. !!!!! Thank you! The picture and the sound is great. I am checking out the Roku device soon.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Robert Rauch
Reviews.Content: The TV is the best purchase I have ever made as far as TV's go. For the price everything on the TV works great. Although the audio on the TV isn't the best, but well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: A great deal
Reviews.Author: Julia
Reviews.Content: What amazing value. We ended up purchasing 4 of them. A real bargain. Great picture. I would purchase these again.

Reviews.Title: Very nice tv
Reviews.Author: Deanne Champagne
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV for our mom for Christmas and so far it is very nice.  She is 80 years old so it was easy to install, ease in setting up favorite channels and helps with her ability to see nice, clear pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv & Protection Plan
Reviews.Author: rockin
Reviews.Content: I love this Tv & I hope i don't ever have to use the protection plan this Tv was so easy to set up an the picture is really nice just wish the speakers was not in the back it does cut down on the sound a bit but as soon as i set up a sound bar on it that will cure that also you can not beat the price I had a samsung 38 inch that cost me three times more then this oCOSMO an I am so glad I bought this what more can you ask for in a tv that has a beautiful picture right out of the box

Reviews.Title: oCOSMO ce4001
Reviews.Author: jim verdini
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv for the price. I was leery at first but gave it a try . it was great easy to set up they even give u the screwdriver to set up the stand good picture ok sound!! was very happy with it went back to buy another one but they were unavailable .I should have bought 2 the iirst time

Reviews.Title: Only had for a limited time
Reviews.Author: Kyle Rudek
Reviews.Content: So far,  it has been a great tv.  A good picture for a great price. I would recommend this brand.

Reviews.Title: I would buy it again
Reviews.Author: Sara
Reviews.Content: i bought it for a gift and they seem pleased. great price, great screen. volume is a bit trebly.  yay

Reviews.Title: Unbelivable Value and Quality for the Money
Reviews.Author: B. W. Finger
Reviews.Content: I'll keep it short and sweet.  Purchased this TV at the Black Friday price of $249.  Received it during the busy Christmas season on the day they said it would arrive.  The 15 year old 20" CRT I replaced weighed probably twice as much as this LED.  Set-up was a breeze.  The aesthetics of the TV are very nice - the thin, matt-black bezel around the screen is a uniform thickness all the way around and looks so much better than many others with glossy and/or non-uniform thickness bezels in my opinion.  The picture quality from my Direct-TV high definition HDMI output is as good as almost TV on the market, and I suspect almost all consumers would agree if they saw the picture.  If anything is a little bit less than outstanding, it is the sound.  It's clear and loud enough, but it does lack in base and mid-range.  However, it is more than good enough for most folks I suspect, especially if it is not your main TV.  As others have done, I will eventually get around to adding a sound bar to beef up the audio.  Finally, I bought the $61.55 5-year in-home warranty to boot, so I've got great peace of mind even though this is a new manufacturer and the jury is still out on longevity.  I highly recommend this TV, even if the price was $100 more than I paid!

Reviews.Title: Great TV!!
Reviews.Author: Dakota
Reviews.Content: For a company that just started and the price of this TV it way exceeded my expectation and it has a lot to offer like plenty of connecting ports for easy everyday use. I'm very happy I purchased this TV and would definitely buy an oCOSMO again. I can't wait to see what they have to offer in the future if this is what they bring to the table just starting, no doubt they will succeed.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: dylan
Reviews.Content: i have had no problems works great sound and picture is amazing this is a great tv i would recommend  this tv

Reviews.Title: Too good to be true!
Reviews.Author: jose flores
Reviews.Content: I'll tell ya I wasn't expecting this TV to have the quality of picture that it has, very happy with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: picture quality
Reviews.Author: Donna Frank
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great!!  I bought this for my grandson's bedroom and the picture is better than the more expensive top brand TV we have in the living room.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: Was looking for a tv for our summer home,  Read all the reviews on ocosmo because i never heard of this brand.  For the size , cost and reading that remote uses sony codes i figure nothing to lose. Since it was december and wouldn't be using it till summer , i decided to hook it up in the bedroom. Took it out of the box , read the instruction , hooked it up and turned it on. Great picture , no problem with sound as per other reviews . Gave it four stars because  its still new .  Would recommend this tv at this time.

Reviews.Title: See below
Reviews.Author: jlwin
Reviews.Content: This TV is quite the surprise!! Has great picture and sound quality for the price.  Would recommend to anyone.  Will not disappoint.

Reviews.Title: What a deal
Reviews.Author: Mangosteen
Reviews.Content: Price and performance. You really can't go wrong with this screen. Don't worry that you've heard of of the company. It's legit.

Reviews.Title: great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: John C. Locke "Johncl1"
Reviews.Content: purchased this about a month ago now, it has a great picture and the features that I was after.  It is on the basic side compared to a lot of modern TVs but it has everything I was after.  The picture is great, sound is OK - could be better, but no complaints here.  Great TV for the price, highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Love it !!!
Reviews.Author: Patti Smith-Simons
Reviews.Content: I am retired and 68, so I argued with myself for 4 days before purchase, read all the reviews.  The nicest and best thing I've done for myself in ages! Set up was so-o-o-o-o easy. After I got the set, set-up, I congratulated and thanked myself endless times, because the picture and reception is beyond terrific. Thank you Amazon for putting something so nice within the reach of my shoddy budget. XO Ms Patti

Reviews.Title: Met expectations.
Reviews.Author: SP "spny23"
Reviews.Content: Worked like a charm right out of the box.Bought Roku stick and it integrated with TV and remote as promised.Nice deal on Roku stick, btw.Want a 50 or 60 inch version.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Lin Gan
Reviews.Content: For the price and the size!!  And it works just fine.  Am no TV expert and just use it to watch trashy shows anyway so I don't need super quality TV.  But as far as I can see, it works great!

Reviews.Title: Great TV and Great Value
Reviews.Author: Canaan McCaslin
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a nice tv, nothing fancy or super exessive for an extra room in the house then this is a great value and choice. Picture is clear and it is a good size.

Reviews.Title: quite pleased
Reviews.Author: happy willie
Reviews.Content: wasn't sure about this brand as i have never heard of it before but took a chance because the price was an eye opener ! quite pleased with this product. can't go wrong for the money.

Reviews.Title: A Must Buy
Reviews.Author: Cedric Murry
Reviews.Content: Great TV. Picture Perfect. If you are looking for a quality tv at a affordable price, this is the tv to buy. Fast shipping plus great quality.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Whippet car nut
Reviews.Content: The actual best buy on the market.  This TV has so many extras on it that blows away the competition

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV
Reviews.Author: BRW
Reviews.Content: I was a little hesitant to buy this unit as the price was so cheap and it was an unknown name. I could not be more pleased with the picture quality. I have two VIZIO units and it is equal in everyway. After doing some research I found that it is the same as the Sceptre made by the same company. I would not hesitate to buy another.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: mandy
Reviews.Content: This tv is great! It has a good picture and good sound. You can't beat the price. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Exceeded expectations
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I'm not an expert on TV's, color ratios, blah blah blah. What I do know is, that for $249.00, my only regret is not buying two. The last TV I bought was a 32" LG back in '09 for around $350. This TV looks better than that one. End of story.I did buy a Roku streaming stick. It works well. Just wish it played YouTube.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price, nice picture and sound.
Reviews.Author: Rob Persing
Reviews.Content: Can't beat price for 40-inch HDTV!!  Only had it for a month, even if it only last for 1 year I still think it's a great deal!!!

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Karl A. Petterson
Reviews.Content: Excellent value this tv has an awesome picture. The sound is lacking so I purchased a sound bar to boost it. It works well with my sony blu ray system.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: William D. Bowen "subvet-609"
Reviews.Content: Set was easy and fast- great picture - don't let the low price scare you off- three hdmi worked well when setting up DVD player and u-verse

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: Doug Yoder
Reviews.Content: The TV has a great picture quality. The set was simple and easy to do. Sound is good for a flat screen. For the price you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: great product for the money
Reviews.Author: S. Pulizzotto
Reviews.Content: great value for the price of other tv's. this tv has a lot of features like the roku ready. tv is slim and has a great picture. I placed it on my lanai

Reviews.Title: best tv for price
Reviews.Author: alex
Reviews.Content: Great image, loud sound. For the 250$ totally worth it. Wouldnt mind picking up a second one for my guest room.

Reviews.Title: great tv great picture
Reviews.Author: alistair green
Reviews.Content: this tv is greatno bells and whispicture is great1080pgood inputswould by this brand againhope they start making 60" and up

Reviews.Title: Great Quality, Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Morgan E Pratt
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift for my boyfriend on the whim. I don't know much about TV's, but the price was right so I took the risk. The picture is clear is sound is clear. Setup was quick and easy. He is incredibly happy and I am impressed with it when I watch it, too! I definitely recommend this. Not to mention, I ordered on a Friday evening, and it arrived on my doorstep Monday late morning.I will say this though - it was shipped in the actual TV box, so anyone who sees the package knows that is inside. Make sure you're home to receive it if you live in an urban area.

Reviews.Title: It was a present
Reviews.Author: Paul Urbanski
Reviews.Content: It was a Christmas present for my mom, she lives about 600 miles from me and she is absolutely thrilled with the tv.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: Its a good TV, definitely not the best. Since it is a 60Hz TV the motion of the picture makes you a little dizzy sometimes. It seems like the TV can't keep up with fast motions. Not the best TV for gaming.

Reviews.Title: A Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Julia Seals
Reviews.Content: Purchased it for my 14 yr old son for a X-Mas gift. We hung it on his wall.He loves it, so im happy.

Reviews.Title: pleased
Reviews.Author: brooksman
Reviews.Content: I would have given it to 5 except for when the volume is down to 1, it is still too loud for a wife trying to sleep next to me. the picture looks amazing, especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: Picture quality is not good
Reviews.Author: Harsh
Reviews.Content: I had Toshiba Lcd tv and I loved it. The videos/movies were lively on it. But when I hooked up ocosmo I felt like the picture were not crisp and lively. HD doesnt look like real HD. Since I paid only $250 I rate it as 3 star.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!!
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: Was kind of skeptical about buying a brand I'd never heard of but it ended up being a lot better than any tv I've own!! Absolutely love it!! Great picture easy installation for a great price!!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Flash
Reviews.Content: This came packaged well and was easy to set up. Very solid picture and easily connects to Roku player. The swivel on the stand is a nice feature.

Reviews.Title: happily suprised.
Reviews.Author: nick salamon
Reviews.Content: Buying a $250 tv 40 inch I was hugely skeptical. Plus the name cosmo I've never heard of. So I did my research and read the reviews. Nothing but good things were said. So I took a chance on it. Let me say I am blown away with the picture quality. And the sound quality is loud and clear. Compared to my  Samsung 40 inch and paid close to $500 for it there is no difference. This company sells for so cheap because they are not well known. It doesn't reflect on quality.

Reviews.Title: very low picture qualities,doesnt shows it's 1080.
Reviews.Author: Hua  k.   LIAO
Reviews.Content: the picture qualities are very low,although its a 40” TV, when I use standard screen, it only shows 30" , and that's the best picture quality screen I can find.

Reviews.Title: great for the price. Excellent  picture  quality.
Reviews.Author: Matt Elmore
Reviews.Content: Great tv for the price. Picture quality is awesome. The sound sucks.. sounds like you are in a tunnel.If you  have a  sound  system,  this  tv  is  awesome.  if  you  don't have a  home  sound  system  you  may  be  greatly  disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Would buy again
Reviews.Author: Jesse Roros
Reviews.Content: Picture is very nice but was somewhat disappointed with sound quality. I would buy it again. It's worth the money

Reviews.Title: I enjoy this TV
Reviews.Author: Linsey
Reviews.Content: I wanted a TV that was a little larger and flat screen.  This TV is working out great.  Really good quality picture.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: alex
Reviews.Content: Great T.V. unbelievable for the price, bought this for my son to play Xbox. Modern design and very light too.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV but arrived with scratches on the screen.
Reviews.Author: Kelly Wright "kswzp9"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for a family member for Christmas. When we went to set it up we realized the TV had scratches on the screen. I asked Amazon for a replacement, but the item was listed as possibly not coming back in stock. The scratches aren't noticeable when watching the TV, especially from a distance, so Amazon offered me a partial refund (I keep the item and also received a $50 refund which I am giving to the family member). I would have rather got a replacement, since it was a gift, but due to the circumstances I thought this was handled well enough.If the TV did not have scratches it would get 5 stars. The picture and sound are quite nice especially for $250.

Reviews.Title: excellent value
Reviews.Author: Thomas W Rogers
Reviews.Content: picture perfect.  This is a basic TV with a price tag to draw attention but that comes with worries about fit, finish, and function; but this TV delivers in the picture department.  Fit and finish are average, but the picture blows other considerations away.  Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Charlene H.
Reviews.Content: this tv has met all expectations, the only issue I have been told about (as it was a gift) was that they are having a problem with netflix on it, I told them to call help line for guidance.

Reviews.Title: Worth It
Reviews.Author: Jacob A. Muchow "Jacob Muchow"
Reviews.Content: Affordable, but everything you really need out of a TV. It's a perfect fit for my Xbox One and I'm glad I got it. It's no different than the big-name brands really.

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: KENNETH BUYANSKY
Reviews.Content: excellent picture for the price. perfect for my mother in law!! came in fast and easy to set up channels. automatically find HD stations. nice

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: jose huffman
Reviews.Content: bought this TV for $250 picture is outstanding ..the speakers are not great Id say OK but I would not let that deter from buying this set (sound bar would fix that)

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: TPinNC
Reviews.Content: I have heard complainants about the sound...the sound is fine. The image is great! The only problem I have had is syncing it with my Direct TV remote. There is no Ocosmo brand available for linking.

Reviews.Title: I recommend this TV
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice high definition TV for the price. Easy to figure out and install. It works just as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: To Whom This May concern:I thought the oCOSMO CE4001 40 inch HDTV worked very good.  The picture quality was very good.  TV set up was user friendly.  My only concern was the blurry picture quality coming from my DVD player.  However, I would recommend it to others.  The price was right too.Sincerely yours,Charles P.

Reviews.Title: A good purchase!!
