So I ordered the tv and I'm glad I did it was easy to put togther and it looks just as good as a name brand.I would purchase it again.

Reviews.Title: Priced right
Reviews.Author: Jan S Gay
Reviews.Content: Nothing fancy, it is exactly what I thought it would be. It works well in the den where it is only used to watch TV shows and Roku movies.

Reviews.Title: WOW what a surprise..
Reviews.Author: RICARDO ROACH
Reviews.Content: Need TV in 2nd bedroom want something nice not just a 32'' to throw in there. This was priced right and it looked good. 2 day shipping with prime and when we got it and opened the box knew we had gotten a great deal. The name is unknown but this TV ROCKS...

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: sean
Reviews.Content: I got my tv it came with no problems. And it works great!!  Haven't found any thing work wrong with it. I would recommend this to anyone

Reviews.Title: perfect for the price
Reviews.Author: ruvelexis
Reviews.Content: It was a good price..and awesome for now is running perfect I hope get it other items like this one

Reviews.Title: Great tv!
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Boldery
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv cause ima poor college kid living with my father and wanted something about 40 in and not too expensive so i decided to take a risk and buy this tv.  We have a Sony 58 in Bravia at my house and this tv is quite comparable.  I have had no problems with it and no complaints other than I think the stand is a little cheap but the tv Is definitely awesome.  I'd recommend this tv to a friend for sure.  I too saw the other reviews about how it's bad and all the problems but they are all probably lying because this tv is definitely a good buy, people will be people so if i were you I'd get it, definitely a good buy especially for the money.

Reviews.Title: Very good tv
Reviews.Author: Joe Casey
Reviews.Content: Picture is very clear and sharp.  setup was easy and quick.  Sound is adequate for my ears.  Would purchase  this mfgr's TVs again.

Reviews.Title: I like this tv
Reviews.Author: Paige Rhymer
Reviews.Content: Really impressed by the quality for the price. I did a lot of research before buying this TV and the positive reviews accurately reflect this tv. It was really easy to assemble and I haven't had any problems with display or audio. It works well with my old roku (not a roku stick) although I had to buy an hdmi cable instead of using the av cables. I'm not huge into technology so I don't know if it's actually a great tv but it's great for what I use it for (netflix, movies...), it looks nice, works well and was easy to put together/use, so I think that makes it great.

Reviews.Title: Decent picture
Reviews.Author: Ryan Barks
Reviews.Content: It's not a Samsung or RCA, but for the price you're not going to get too much better. Good buy.

Reviews.Title: cool tv super thin
Reviews.Author: chris mcmillan
Reviews.Content: gave it to my dad he loved it will hang on his wall with the help of an electrician sounds  great  I like  the thin trim  and the electric savings  13 per year is what it said  this truly is a bright eyed and bushy tailed new company and I will be back for more ocosmo

Reviews.Title: excellent tv for an excellent price= terrific value
Reviews.Author: William H. Winkler "tkdbill"
Reviews.Content: i had been looking for a tv for a while to replace the box we had been watching our movies on. when this presented itself i leapt at the deal. i used the regular delivery and it arrived quickly even for the time of year.  thanks for the great tv

Reviews.Title: Pretty good picture remote control not easy to use
Reviews.Author: Anthony Appling
Reviews.Content: First Led TV like the large screen makes it easy to see with bad vision. Price was good for a person on a low budget

Reviews.Title: buy this!
Reviews.Author: nanmitch
Reviews.Content: excellent tv and great price! just a great deal on a great product. clear picture and the sound is great

Reviews.Title: better then i expected
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: has a lot of ports for hdmi good picture good buy for bedroom and livingroom tv and it swivels on top for you to adjust with no problem

Reviews.Title: great value for the price
Reviews.Author: Milweiser
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV for our kids rec room for them to watch TV and play video games.  The picture quality is really nice and clear.  I was really worried about thr 60hz refresh rate with the Xbox but so far I havent seen any issues.  I really love this TV for the price.  Honestly the pucture quality is good enough for even a main room TV.  there are plenty of inputs for all our devices (we have a Uverse and Xbox 360 via HDMI) and a PS2 vie component.  all look great.  I am not a fan of the sound en b ancer but then I dont use that freature on my smart TV either.  We received it about a month ago and are really happy with the purchase

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price.
Reviews.Author: Dylan Jutte
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV after reading the reviews and it for the price I couldn't really pass it up. I went in to buying this TV thinking that if it breaks within 2 years I would have got my monies worth. The only issue I had with this was that I couldn't find a code to work with my Comcast Remote. After researching online I finally found another customer who had found a valid one. For reference I used code 10000.Overall a great picture, sound is slightly lacking, but happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Ocoso T.V..
Reviews.Author: Loren W. Farr
Reviews.Content: Only had the T.V. for a couple months so far so good. Picture is good. Using it as a second set for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Not Top of the Line, but Not Bad Either
Reviews.Author: C. OMalley "ChuckOMalley"
Reviews.Content: Ok, so it isn't a top of the line LED TV, but I'm not a big videophile and as far as I can tell the picture is crisp and clear.  Threw in Avatar, which to me is THE Blu-Ray to test any TV's picture with, and it looks amazing.  Think I will buy the companion sound bar to round it out.

Reviews.Title: poor pic quality
Reviews.Author: Msnada92
Reviews.Content: The pic is ok...a lil too dark and not as crisp. The sound is way too low and sound's far away.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: staceylee
Reviews.Content: Great TV couldn't be happier with my purchase on Amazon. My kids are happy and so are we especially since we got it before Christmas!!!

Reviews.Title: one real bargain
Reviews.Author: Al clark
Reviews.Content: I took a chance on Amazon's name and it was well worth it!  picture and sound are impressive.  A solid buyh

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Connie Dailey
Reviews.Content: FANTASTIC DEAL/ I was very impressed. Reccomend it highly.Price, color tone a great TV/ Looks great too...I reccommend it to  anyone

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: allen may
Reviews.Content: I was amazed at the picture on this TV.  I could not be more happy with this purchase.  I would buy this brand again.

Reviews.Title: Best TV for the price available
Reviews.Author: Megan
Reviews.Content: This is the best quality (and biggest screen size) TV you will find right now for the price. I was hesitant to buy one that was not a known name brand, but after reading the reviews I decided it would be worth the risk. Couldn't be happier so far.

Reviews.Title: loving this TV
Reviews.Author: Grace Free
Reviews.Content: So glad I didn't spend twice the price like I could have. The picture quality is great, but what I'm most impressed with is sound! I can put it volume on 1, and hear it fine!! Really great quality!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: betty bazemore
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV after purchasing and returning a 32" Samsung Smart TV.  (Read my review of the smart TV).  I have had and used the oCosmo TV for about 3 weeks and I am very satisfied.  It has a great picture and sound.  It has all the features including a VGA connection. that allows me to use an old desk top; computer to stream television.  I was somewhat hesitant to buy a cheap "off brand" television, but this TV has met all my expectations.  I wanted to use a small antenna to get the local stations and stream the other stations I wanted to watch without using cable.  I have been able to do this well.  I have not used the Roku feature as I have not needed it.  I can watch local TV and stream many television channels, plus You Tube, Netflix, and Hulu.  The only one I pay for is a subscription to Netflix.  I can also use the TV as a moniter for my computer.  It works well in switching between these functions. I highly recommend this TV.  Let me also say that Amazon was great to deal with.  I purchased the Samsung Smart TV and was not satisfied with it Amazon accepted it back and promptly refunded my money. The oCosmo is a great TV and Amazon was great to buy from.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: kwag01
Reviews.Content: I got bought this for a gift, fast shipping. They love it and it was better than expected for the price.

Reviews.Title: Smart Purchase
Reviews.Author: pat
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is very fine. The sound could use better speakers but that is an easy add-on. The remote controller is confusing to use. The mute button is poorly place. We are very pleased overall.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV !
Reviews.Author: Marty
Reviews.Content: This TV delivers a sharp picture, great color rendition , good sound and everything I want in a TV. Bought for a rental place but definitely would recommend for someone's home. Can't beat the price (I paid $278) and I think it compares to TV's costing twice the price.

Reviews.Title: TV raiting
Reviews.Author: Edward M. Krebs
Reviews.Content: The unit was fairly easy to get installed and functioningIt has been function very well picture is good and the sound is good

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Tyers
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my mother.  Works and looks great.  I still can't believe the price.  Really good value in my mind.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: pdcam99
Reviews.Content: This is my first LED TV so hard to compare, but for a budget brand TV the picture is sharp and more than adequate for my needs (part-time TV in the pool room).  Would recommend it to anyone on a budget.

Reviews.Title: Good product, better customer service!
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: The TV looks great and was a great bargain when I purchased it! The only thing was, the TV remote did not work, you could hear broken pieces moving inside of it. I called the customer service department and they were very nice and 2 day shipped a new remote to me with no questions asked!

Reviews.Title: Not a bad tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Ms. Mac "Carmen"
Reviews.Content: This tv was very easy to assemble and set up right out of the box (although is was missing screws).The picture is great, but sound is a bit "vibrating" at times, Great price!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for what I needed
Reviews.Author: Greg Lang
Reviews.Content: 5 stars. Very clear picture. Not heavy. Simple to unbox and setup. It might only be 60 Hz, which explains the price. But I use it in my office, mostly looking at Power Point presentations, so don't need the fast refresh rate. I'd recommend for anyone who needs a screen this size for this type of purpose.

Reviews.Title: Cosmo TV:  A fabulous buy for an inexpensive price!
Reviews.Author: Lynne Westfahl
Reviews.Content: I love my new Cosmo TV.  The picture is clear and the sound is great.  This is a fabulous buy for an inexpensive price!

Reviews.Title: The right size
Reviews.Author: Mr. "C"
Reviews.Content: The Ocosmo 40" was easy to set up and use is great. The picture is very clear and has very good sound.

Reviews.Title: Very nice for the money
Reviews.Author: Steven Bradford
Reviews.Content: I used these reviews to decide what HDTV to buy and I can say that I'm happy with the decision. The set was easy to set up, sounds fine and the picture was very nice. The blacks are not as sharp as more expensive HDTV's, which is why I gave it only 4 stars, however for the price, it is not a huge detail.

Reviews.Title: Great value tv
Reviews.Author: Jodi Petoskey
Reviews.Content: Meets all my expectations for a brand I haven't heard of and great price. This tv has several options normally not found on a lower priced tv

Reviews.Title: I'm using this as a Computer Monitor via Hdmi, for my needs it is perfect.
Reviews.Author: Wayne R Severson
Reviews.Content: I've not used the on board sound, I've not used it for Television at all, though my belief is it would do well!FYI, Things such as embeded text in software and web pages are not nearly as clear as what you would see on a dedicated monitor,  but for me with my main use being for mixing music with a DAW I love having the large graphics of the mixer on this 40 inch!

Reviews.Title: Love this tv
Reviews.Author: stacy d.
Reviews.Content: This tv is awesome. Great picture at a great price. Will definitely buy another one for my kids bedroom r.

Reviews.Title: 40 in cosmo TV
Reviews.Author: brad smith
Reviews.Content: picture quality and sound are very good, great value for the price. have used unit for 1 month, easy setup.

Reviews.Title: Roku Ready Information needed
Reviews.Author: BW
Reviews.Content: I like the TV but I don't know what the Roku Ready HDTV is. Maybe you can give me some information as to how the Roku Ready works??

Reviews.Title: I'd buy more!
Reviews.Author: Ryan Tempro
Reviews.Content: For the price you can't beat it. I was leery about it because I had never heard of it but I'm impressed. Almost all LEDs are made the same and this one is great. We will see how it holds up but after a week of use it still looks great.

Reviews.Title: Condo Equipment
Reviews.Author: rick
Reviews.Content: Bought for a condo we have and did not want to spend a lotta cash, we are not expecting the moon as far a viewing but I felt it was a great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Rate it for what it is.
Reviews.Author: Crispin
Reviews.Content: I recently moved and needed a decent tv... fast. One that I wouldn't mind in my bedroom later. This was cheap and did the trick. Sure it only has a 60hz refresh rate, but it gets the job done quite well. This will make a nice tv for my bedroom once I get a nice plasma to replace it. If you know what you are buying, you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: oCOSMO CE4001 40" LED TV
Reviews.Author: Gary Austin
Reviews.Content: Recieved on time and well packaged. It took a little adjustment to get the color and contrast right but it is a nice picture now that it is adjusted. Great product for the money even though I was sceptical to begin with because I was not aware of the oCOSMO name.

Reviews.Title: Review on Cosmo 40-inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: Olivia
Reviews.Content: I was nervous at first but I'm now very pleased with my purchase. The quality is good and it does everything I want it to.

Reviews.Title: Great Product for the Price!
Reviews.Author: Donna Poplin
Reviews.Content: Gave this as a gift for Christmas.  Fast shipping, great price, great product.  TV has great picture quality, I will recommend this product to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Cosmo ce4001 40 inch
Reviews.Author: arnebfc
Reviews.Content: Love the television, and it fits perfect in our living room.  Nice and clear, and sharp picture.  Very easy to hook up and to work.  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Got to get it if you don't have much to spend !!!
Reviews.Author: Javier
Reviews.Content: I love it , really good for its price has great picture. One of the best deals ever for a tv

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality and sound!
Reviews.Author: David Kassel
Reviews.Content: This TV was a great purchase and the quality of the picture and sound is great.  Make sure to call your local Cable company to synch your TV with the remote.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV FOR THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: Arthur
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to do show my videos while DJing. It worked great. Just plugged in the HDMI cord and the picture was perfect for my party. Im thinking about buying another one.

Reviews.Title: A legit deal
Reviews.Author: Anders E. Gidlund
Reviews.Content: An amazing deal, equal to any $400 set. If you're in a bargain hunter mode, rather than absolute quality hunter, this is possibly the best deal south of a "cheap" $800 Panny Plasma.Almost imperceptible flash lighting (usually the serious issue with these cheap sets), initially coming up from right-center, though improved after extended power cycles. Even on hard black output, I had to go hunting for it.Excellent white and black levels with (surprisingly) Dynamic Contrast on Low.No visible ghosting or lag issues perceptible to my eyes.Runs a little crushed out of the box, recommend bumping the brightness, otherwise very good RGB coverage.A few dithering issues on cable broadcast, however it's difficult to separate that from general 1080i signal source problems.

Reviews.Title: Awesome deal
Reviews.Author: Tammy Thacker
Reviews.Content: We received this TV in just a few days after placing our order. Everything came with it we needed. This more than met our expectations.

Reviews.Title: great price
Reviews.Author: Chris Hahn
Reviews.Content: 40 inch led system for $270, not too bad at all! Has sufficient collection inputs/outputs and satisfactory, if not stellar display (only 60hz, and not the sharpest/brightest picture).  Considering the price it is a great performer and great value.  No real problems out of the box.  Had to perform just a little setup tweaking for the audio because I am using computer speakers connected via headphone jack; a full set of mini phono jacks for a 5.1 computer speaker system is not provided.  Interesting, though, the remote supports control of a sound bar, and that is the better way to go if you can afford one.

Reviews.Title: review on my ocosmo 40" television
Reviews.Author: bebee bowling
Reviews.Content: the fact I haven't had many tvs I have found in the short time ive had this one that it is giving me clear sharp, and glorious colors.hdtv. on the tv is lovely even tho I don't use it much.it is easy to use the instruction book. I like it very much.

Reviews.Title: Hard to beat for the price.
Reviews.Author: J. Turner
Reviews.Content: I was kinda bummed that this TV was sold out for the Christmas holiday, but luckily a few popped up in the Amazon Warehouse Deals in time for me to get one for the Holiday.Overall, this is an incredible deal for the money. Not much can touch it for the price. Picture looks great. Hopefully i will be able to adjust the picture to look even better once it has time to burn in. I'm using it for general streaming and TV purposes, so I can't comment on its gaming capabilities.The only things I don't like about it is that the stand systems seems a bit flimsy, but I plan on wall mounting in the future so that's a bit of a moot point for me. My biggest gripe is the sound quality; it's very thin and tinny. I can get plenty of volume so that I can hear the sound, but the sound quality itself is sub-par.

Reviews.Title: F***ING AMAZING!
Reviews.Author: Diana Morton
Reviews.Content: I had all the doubts about this TV BUT IT'S PRETTY SWEET!! :) HUGE! top of the line quality! Don't let an unknown brand fool you! :)

Reviews.Title: oCOSMO 40-inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: BLUE69DKG
Reviews.Content: Great price! Great delivery! No problems with set-up. Plenty of features. HD should be 100% clear, this is about 95%. All in all, a great buy.Registering warranty could be easier.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a good price
Reviews.Author: Gary Errett
Reviews.Content: The picture is great, able to turn enough without moving it sounds good, great TV for my bedroom, the price was excellent, arrived in great time

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Ashley Armstrong
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure what to expect for the great price of this TV considering the size, but it is amazing. The picture is bright. There are lots of inputs. However, there isn't a digital optic.

Reviews.Title: Re Cosmo
Reviews.Author: maryann rojas
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a Christmas gift already gave it to the family member , we set it up and the picture is nice and clear  the sound is just ok you will need to add  a  sound bar  tv is a good price

Reviews.Title: it is what it is
Reviews.Author: Andrew Moeller
Reviews.Content: It is a little silly to compare this TV to high end models. That is like complaining about McDonald's because its not a French bistro. For how much it costs, it is a good value.

Reviews.Title: Incredbile Buy!  Get the oCosmos CB301524W soundbar as well and cant go wrong!
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: This TV is incredible for the price!  I was very skeptical because of the very low price but the picture is crystal clear!  Sure there are better TVs out there but I can not justify paying hundreds more for specs that will barely make a difference.  There are a couple of reasons why I am giving it 4 out of 5 stars versus 5 out of 5.  The remote could be better.  I have a very large living room and the remote only works within 15-20 ft.  I rectified this problem by programming my cable remote and now i have full range.  Make sure to use SONY remote codes when programing universal remotes.  The other problem with the remote is that the source button only brings up the source list and does not toggle through the inputs.  Not a huge deal but it makes my cable remote useless for changing inputs.  Lastly the sound is not that great.  All treble no bass.  However I strongly recommend purchasing the oCosmos CB301524W 2.1 Sound Bar System with Built-In Subwoofer, Wi-Fi, and Android OS  (B00ABAWHIM currently only $49!  Cant believe the price and it also turns the TV into a smart tv with android apps!  Overall extremely pleased with this purchase and would recommend this TV to anyone.  Buy the soundbar as well and you cant go wrong! Smart TV with great sound for under $300!

Reviews.Title: No not some paid person to write reviews. Real Review!
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: I'm giving this 4 stars but I don't know if that will change over the time period or not. Well quick delivery and I was very fortunate to have bought this as one of the last ones in stock. I would like to point out some things that I thought were somewhat the "cons" of such a deal. In my opinion the sound is great of course you can tweak it to the "best" settings that suites your needs however getting a sound bar? Are you deaf? The sound is great unless you are listening from like 50 ft away or going deaf. But, in all honest I don't think I need a sound bar like some reviewers are saying. I think it's acceptable unless you want to boost it then go for it. Here is where it gets to the cons. I tested my X Box 360 on it hoping some reviews I read where wrong about the couple of seconds delay for the picture to catch up. That is true, unfortunately. As you are playing let's say Black Ops II Zombies and running through that fire in Town Survival the whole screen is a blur and very uncomfortable to play especially if you are the last one alive! The picture takes a while to catch up if you are in motion like running etc. I haven't had the time to actually mess around with it if it does that to all the picture settings. But be warned the past reviews on this are true. To SOME gamers this wont really be a big deal if you are playing from far but if you are playing up close it is so noticeable. I wear glasses and the blur is just intensified. But as to watching TV from lets say a couch in the living room then it's fine. But for a deal on an 40" TV I can live with that. I will update more on my review as soon as I get all the tweaks out and get it to my gaming setup.

Reviews.Title: not bad fot the price
Reviews.Author: jermaine richards
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is very good but sound quality is very poor.  Like an earlier review seems like my hdmi port 1 no longer works.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Serena
Reviews.Content: This TV is nice and light, looks good, has good picture and all the inputs you need, and it gets lots of channels even with a less than optimal antenna. The only thing it doesn't have is an alarm/on timer. (I like to have my TV wake me up with the morning exercise shows. But my last TV didn't have it either.) Even though the built-in speakers aren't that great, they still sound ok, and we use our stereo speakers anyway. Well worth what we paid. Haven't gotten Roku yet, but really glad we have the option.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic T.V.
Reviews.Author: DOMENIC SANTUCCI
Reviews.Content: This T.V. is an excellent value. Easy to put into operation a child could do it. I like that the T.V. goes on quickley when you turn it on and the picture is beautiful.

Reviews.Title: Roku Streaming Stick Coupon now $20 off
Reviews.Author: Randy King
Reviews.Content: Haven't plugged in the TV (it is a gift) but I did crack open the box and use the Roku Streaming Stick coupon code to get a Roku Stick for the recipient. Ordered the 3400M at $20 of for a total of $49.99. Not a bad deal. Hope they like the TV with the Roku!

Reviews.Title: Far better than I had expected.
Reviews.Author: Adrian Holmes
Reviews.Content: This is our first HDTV and the set up on it was as easy as it gets. Being Roku Ready makes using it with Amazon Prime a no brainer as well.

Reviews.Title: Great TV - Cannot go wrong at the price
Reviews.Author: Eoin Walsh
Reviews.Content: This TV is a steal at the price. Set up is easy and it is really light. Wall mounting it was a breeze and picture was good right out of the box. If you are looking for a 40" tv and don't need all the whistles and bells buy this tv.

Reviews.Title: Does the job, hopefully it will last a while!
Reviews.Author: Chad Cunningham
Reviews.Content: Couldn't pass up the budget price on this one. While everyone says bigger is better, in my living room I think it's a great size (we sit about 6' away) as I'm not a fan of having a giant TV dominate the room. I suspect if you are a discerning customer this may not be the TV for you, but if that's the case you're probably not reading this review anyway. In my case, our main TV was a 32" Vizio 720p LCD from about 2005. That was back when Vizio was a brand name no one ever heard of and was a cheap chinese no-name tv like this is today. And I had pretty good luck with it so why not try it again!TVs have come a long way since then. This new one is so much thinner and lighter (though perhaps being light weight is not a good sign). It looks much better, thin with a narrow bezel, and the swiveling base is a nice touch. The picture looks good to me as well, compared to the 720p 32" it's much sharper and the added size helps. It does seem much cooler (color temperature) than my old TV but I haven't played with settings much and perhaps the old one was overly warm.The only negatives I've found so far are:1. The english in the manual is pretty bad. Not sure why they can't hire a native speaker to proofread these things.2. The audio out is only RCA or RCA-style digital. My receiver/blue-ray player only has a optical digital in, so I don't think I can hook up a digital output from the tv to the receiver. Not sure if that really matters though, sounds ok with just L/R RCA.3. The third HDMI port takes a few seconds to activate as it checks if whatever is plugged in is an MHL device.I sprung for the square trade 3 year warranty on here for $21 to hedge my bets a bit. At the price, as long as this tv lasts 5 years or so I think it's a fine buy.Update: One additional note, the USB port on the TV will power a chromcast which is a nice touch.

Reviews.Title: Great tv great price
Reviews.Author: Megan
Reviews.Content: TV is great! Only reason took one star off is because when there is no sound if it sits there for too long it starts making a strange buzzing noise that gets louder the more it sits there. This could also be something I don't know how to fix tho that really simple to fix!

Reviews.Title: My TV
Reviews.Author: D'Aundre Thomas
Reviews.Content: I LOVE my tv it's a perfect size for my room and the picture is clear! I recommend this to whoever is looking for a decent size clear picture television at a low price!

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Jose Rivera
Reviews.Content: Bought this on a black friday deal and our first few weeks with it have been great.Nothing really noticable (yet) but for the price we're still on the wary side.I'll keep posting as I get more and more use out of it but so far so good!

Reviews.Title: oCOSMO 40-inch 1080p 60Hz LED MHL & Roku Ready HDTV (Glossy Black)
Reviews.Author: pumpkin
Reviews.Content: This TV is great for the price. I needed a TV for the bedroom. Nothing fancy it serves the purpose. Never heard of the brand oCosmo, but I purchase it anyway. So far no problem. I did connect Monster Cable U3 Ultra 1000 HDMI to the TV and the picture is nice and clear.  For the price it works for me!! and my Roku works great with it!!

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly high quality
Reviews.Author: Tony "SergeantPope"
Reviews.Content: oCosmo scared me. Probably you too. I gave it a shot, since the reviews were so positive, and I'm glad with my purchase.The price almost seems to good to be true, but the picture and sound is better than I personally expected. The 1080p picture looks great, even at 60Hz. The sound isn't totally impressive, but let's be honest, almost every TV doesn't have great built in speakers. And since this TV has audio output for SPDIF, RCA, and Auxillary, you can easily get some awesome external speakers or a sound bar.The remote is also something I want to mention. The design of it is pretty mediocre, to be honest. However, it actually works great. It can even control a Roku receiver and soundbar (although it probably only supports oCosmo sound bars).Finally, the overall build quality of this TV is excellent. I just got a 32" Samsung Smart TV which costed more than this and I personally think this brand is better. It doesn't have any frills; it does what you ask it to do very well, and at a low price.The only unknown with this TV is dependability over the long term. Since this company was founded in early 2013, nobody really knows if these TVs will last. It does come with a year of warranty though, so you're good for atleast a year.

Reviews.Title: Great deal for the money
Reviews.Author: Cindy L. Acker
Reviews.Content: Ordered this with the free shipping, still came in 2 days. Nice clear picture, plenty of connection ports. Only minor issue is Direct TV does not have a code yet to program their remote. A great deal with free shipping that is cheaper than the big box stores and you don't have to go get it. Hard to go wrong here.

Reviews.Title: Nice tv so far
Reviews.Author: Joselyne velazquez "Joselyne Velazquez"
Reviews.Content: This was my first purchase of a HD TV before I had a Toshiba 2005 DVD and VCR combo so when I first got this I was really excited. I couldn't wait to try it out when I finally got the TV I was completely in love with it is a nice tv. You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: sharon lillge
Reviews.Content: Great tv for the price.  It is loud enough for us but we have it in our bedroom and has a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Loved it, but exchanged for bigger one!
Reviews.Author: Lois
Reviews.Content: Loved the picture, but decided to exchange it for the  larger screen oCOSMO. Sleek, non obtrusive and beautiful picture. Will definitely buy this brand again.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV, Awesome Price
Reviews.Author: Stephen
Reviews.Content: The tv has exceeded my expectations. The price competes with those of black friday, and other than that you would have no idea this product was so affordable.Picture quality is great out of the box. If you like to tweak, they do have a lot of options that you would expect, sharpness, brightness, color, color modes, etc. For me the image was already beautiful and the colors seemed accurate.The sound is actually decent for a flat screen. Again you have a lot of options on this as well. Things like better clarity and surprisingly a built in equalizer!The variety of ports on the back is great and incredibly convenient. The remote itself actually has built in soundbar controls and roku controls (For a roku stick, one of which doesn't come with a remote, it is meant for these tvs!)Another thing that surprised me was how light this thing is. I lifted the box and thought it might be empty. At 27 pounds I had no trouble setting it up in my room. For such a large tv I can't believe how light it is.For the price I don't think you can beat this tv. I would take this over a Samsung or LG at double the price any day.

Reviews.Title: a little trouble at first with delivery but very pleased
Reviews.Author: Tiff
Reviews.Content: I had originally purchased this tv last week it was due to be delivered and it never showed up, fedex did not do the signature and when I got home it was not here. I was very upset... I called amazon explained the situation, they sent a replacement out on Friday with next day shipping. Well I received the tv today (monday due to weekend) just in time for my mothers Birthday. My brother and I set it up very fast and easy, she will be in shock once she gets home! Picture is awesome and the sound is impeccable.  Great job ocosmo! & amazon for the wonderful customee service!

Reviews.Title: Best deal I've gotten all year!!
Reviews.Author: Marie Messina
Reviews.Content: We were skeptical about this tv because of the mixed reviews. But this tv is GREAT!! The shipping was fast & easy. It came to us in perfect condition (even the box). The set up was painless & the picture & sound are Amazing! We bought the Rocu as well, & as promised it pluged right in. I feel this tv was a great deal & i would highly recommend it to Anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase, fast shipping, great if not excellent quality for the money.
Reviews.Author: Kevin Friend
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV and am happy with it, it is just what it says it is, I bought it on Amazon and the price was right. I got it much faster than expected and unwrapped it, it was very easy to hook up and get going. I adjusted the color and sound to my wants and it seems to be a great purchase. I am going to buy a speaker bar for it as the sound on regular TV/Cable is fine, for the movie quality sound though I believe the speaker bar will be great. As well it is weighs very little, I am going to mount it on the wall as well to save some room. I would suggest this TV to anyone wanting a good TV that functions properly. I used this TV to replace a 42" projection. The picture is as good if not better. I really like the smaller package and it looks great. Great buy. I would have rated it 5 stars if the speakers were movie quality, but I got what I paid for and much more so no issues at all.

Reviews.Title: OCosmo 40 inch LED
Reviews.Author: Daniel Walker
Reviews.Content: Very Bright, ROKU MHL works great, no issue setting up, menu very easy to figure out. Great Picture for the price!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Excellent Picture, Quick Shippping.
Reviews.Author: Ken Grindstaff
Reviews.Content: TV was shipped very quickly.  Set up was a breeze.  Picture is excellent. I consider this an excellent buy.  I wasn't sure about the name brand, but decided to give it a try, given the Cyber Monday pricing.  Glad I did as we love the TV.

Reviews.Title: It is as they say! (Perfect for me) Big Screen and Nice price (NOTHING WRONG) BUY IT!
Reviews.Author: Cosorio
Reviews.Content: Its just what i wanted ... a perfect big screen, it is not the best product out there but i have nothing bad to say about it (GOOD PRICE) ... If i see anything else oCOSMO  i'll be sure that i can buy it, i won't be afraid of that brand, NICE TV, NICE RESOLUTION,  Everything is perfect with it (I'm using it as an extended screen) and it works FLAWLESS , I'll recommend this to anyone that is looking for a cheap and NICE Screen/monitor/Tv

Reviews.Title: Awesome value for the price, great picture quality - at least on par with the average, at the fraction of a cost...
Reviews.Author: CShooter
Reviews.Content: This thing is amazing for the price. I wasn't looking to purchase a TV, but I was in a market to step up my PC monitor size from 27" to something bigger, if possible (still using my 27" as a desktop extension on my windows). When I've seen the Black Friday / Cyber Monday $249 deal (was $278) for this TV, I had to try one. I placed an order without seeing any good reviews of how this TV would operate as a computer screen. 3 days later I had my TV delivered. First I opened the box and checked all the contents for missing parts, as at least one reviewer on here was missing some parts. Everything was in the box, so I went ahead to assemble it. Assembly was a breeze - I didn't even need the manual, they even provide you with a phillips screwdriver that you will need for assembly. Hooked it up to my computer & powered it on. I was instantly amazed by the picture of this TV, it more than met my expectations for the price. Full HD is awesome on this screen. Video quality is on par with most of the brand name manufacturers out there. Viewing angles are as good as any other, except for Samsung - from what I've seen. The sound is good, but not great, although at this price you're not going to have it all, because TV makers that put more into their TV's, know that "bells & whistles" are worth the higher price - so they are more than happy to charge us for 'em. This also works well as a PC screen as I've come to find out. Obviously with a bigger screen, the pixels will be more visible if you sit to close, but if you sit farther back or if your vision is not great this works VERY well. I'm glad I've made this purchase. Amazon did great as usual, quick & free shipping and all. I just hope that this oCosmo does as well as my 27" I-Inc (another no name brand) LCD screen as far as reliability & dependability goes. Time will tell, otherwise highly recommended, if no name brands don't intimidate you.

Reviews.Title: Great, great, great
Reviews.Author: Diane Lapidus "dianeml"
Reviews.Content: Great price great picture and good sound!  But most of all super easy to set up by a technology challenged senior citizen.

Reviews.Title: An Amazing TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Terry J. Dean
Reviews.Content: I've never purchased an off-brand TV before most recently having owned Samsung, LG, & Panasonic, but I thought for $249 it was worth the risk to purchase this oCosmo based on the good reviews.  I am simply amazed at the picture quality this set produces. I recently purchased a 58" Panasonic edge-lit LED TV & the oCosmo is equal to it in picture quality. It's off-axis viewing is even better than the Panasonic. It does have limited picture settings (no back light control) but even without these you can get an excellent picture. If I have to criticize anything it would be the rather flimsy stand and the sound is not the best but I'm using my home theater receiver for sound so that's not an issue.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied With This TV
Reviews.Author: underdog2904
Reviews.Content: Great price. Very light tv. Picture looks good on HD channels. Easy set up. Coaxial connector in back. I was worried about sound being an issue after reading some reviews. But it sounds find to me. I'm very happy with this purchase. I feel I got a great deal. Off center viewing is fine

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Chavez
Reviews.Content: Best tv ive ever bought im serious, for 40' at half the price of any other 40' tv, i highly reccomend it for low price and it looks great, i use it for my desktop and it looks great and also for playing xbox online

Reviews.Title: Great Tv for the price!!!!
Reviews.Author: Henry Smith
Reviews.Content: I just got this Tv today and it hooked up very fast,The picture looks great the sound is also very good,I would order another one if needed,everything about this Tv is awesome from the price all the way to the picture,sound and shipping!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: martin marshall
Reviews.Content: I ordered the TV taking a chance on it being an off brand and the price 250.Recieved the TV set it up everything was there the picture on the TV was great sound was ok that's why I bought the sound bar to go with the TV by the same maker that made it sound great very happy with the TV and sound bar . Also the TV can become a smart TV telling you great price recommend this TV for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Good TV At The Moment.
Reviews.Author: G. Schloicka
Reviews.Content: I got this TV on 12/4/2013. I have been playing around with all the settings and the TV seems pretty good for the money. I have no idea why people say the sound is not great. I have it set on only 15 and can hear it 15 feet away with no problem. Not sure what your looking for. The pic is good through my Roku but I haven't been able to test it on my direct tv yet as I need to replace my current box with a hd receiver. I will update my review once I change it. I'll give it a 4 rating until I can check out the hd pic in full.Ok have finally hooked up the TV to an HD box and the pic is very good on the HD stations. The pic is adequate on the SD stations. For $250.00 you'd be hard pressed to get better. I can't complain about my purchase. Now we'll see about the longevity of the TV. Overall I'd give it a 4.5 rating.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value for cost
Reviews.Author: Arthur O. Harris
Reviews.Content: Just received this TV set, so far i am very pleased.  The screen is bright, sharp and clear, the unit is relatively light and easy to assembly (just four screws on base).  I did not notice an installation guide but you really don't need one, it did have a nice little screw drive to assembly the base.I connected one of the 3 HDMI inputs to a ROKU XS 2 and the picture was Ok, with a small tweak of the brightness, contrast and picture mode the results were dramatically improved.  The only other tweak was to the sound, i increased the bass slightly and decreased the treble a bit and all was good.  The only pain point was using the auto channel detection for Over the Air and cable channels without an adapter, there about 100 or so items found but only 20-25 were useable, i had to go item by item set the detected channel as "skip" or "favorite", once this selection process was completed the channel selector button on the remote provide easy access to designated favorite channels.  This was my only pain point, for the decent picture quality and low unit price, I can manage with this pain point.

Reviews.Title: Good Price for Large and Low Quality Screen
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: There is a ton of artifacting regardless of the content, but I got this for my guest room, so I'm not too concerned with the poor video quality that comes with the large screen size for a low price.40" for $250 is a good value as far as I'm concerned and it's replacing a 32" Panasonic that had great video quality but also cost $250 (on sale at Costco).If you aren't too bothered by all the blocky artifacts on the screen or are using the TV for a guest room or kid's room, it's worth the money, but if you really need a better quality picture, you'll have to pay more for the same size or go smaller.I'm not sure what to make of people who proclaim this TV as having incredible quality. That's honestly not what I'm seeing, nor what I was expecting for such a low price. You can see an example in my product photos.Also wanted to mention that if you need to program another remote to talk to this TV, it uses the same code as Sony. (That took me a little while to figure out with my Dish TV remote.)

Reviews.Title: Great Screen For The Money
Reviews.Author: Benjamin
Reviews.Content: This screen is nicer than I expected. The build quality is good, I don't think making it any more durable would be of any extra benefit for a TV. It's sturdy on the stand and feels like it would stay standing through a quake or whatever might happen. The packaging was unexpectedly great with good bumpers in the corners of the box, a heavy duty screen protector, and the few little parts for the stand and remote in resealable plastic bags. The only thing I didn't like about how the screen arrived is that there were some stickers on the face of the screen itself that peeled off cleanly, but to get the corners up to get a grip I had to scratch uncomfortably hard on the screen with my nail. Had me a little worried that I might cause damage before I even plugged it in, but that turned out fine.The picture is good enough that I really can't say anything negative about it without having a second TV to compare it to. Blacks are deep black. The only bummer is that it really wasn't made for up close viewing and doesn't quite look right from closer than 5 feet or so. The viewing angle is too narrow or something so it darkens slightly at the corners when you're looking at the center of the screen from close up. It wouldn't be an issue except that I'm using the screen as a computer monitor half the time. Haven't tried using the in screen speakers.Bottom line after seeing this TV in person, it's awesome for the price. I wouldn't have paid $100 more if it had meant a name brand model, let alone $500 which is more like the actual price difference.Edit: Also, as another reviewer said, this screen does look a ton better if you adjust the picture settings to your taste. I particularly found it to look soooo much nicer after I went into advanced picture settings and turned off Dynamic Contrast which comes set at low from the factory.

Reviews.Title: awesome price
Reviews.Author: SVS
Reviews.Content: I love this tv. I thought with such a great price that i was setting myself up for disappointment. We mounted it on our wall. The size was perfect for the space we needed it to fit in. Love it!

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: boomboom what
Reviews.Content: whatever people say bad about this tv don't listen because this tv is great love it great quality good price I had a 32 inch but it was to small so I got the 40 nice size as well and good for gaming if your a gamer

Reviews.Title: Super
Reviews.Author: Jasmin Gauthier
Reviews.Content: For the price it is impossible to find this size and this quality of tv thank you formy new tv

Reviews.Title: SUPER DEAL............
Reviews.Author: HENRY GARCIA
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A WONDERFUL TV,  THE PICTURE AND SOUND IS VERY GOOD FOR THE PRICE A GREAT VALUE.VERY HAPPY I PURCHASED IT WOULD RECOMMEND TO ANYONE.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: John Cornelison
Reviews.Content: I'll admit I was slightly concerned about how much I would like this T.V., but for the price it was worth a shot.  I'll say that after owning it for a couple of weeks that it rivals any other 40 inch T.V. I have seen.  I would recommend this product for anyone on a budget  looking for a good TV!!!

Reviews.Title: As expected
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: This tv was a gift for my parents who have not bought a new tv in 10 years so I wasn't looking for the top tv available. It arrived on time and packaged as one would expect. The quality is what I would expect for a tv at this price. All said and done it's exactly what I was looking to get.

Reviews.Title: Bang for the buck.
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: It only cost $250 a total steal. Also the brush metal is much nicer quality than I expected it to be.

Reviews.Title: Happy with oCosmo!
Reviews.Author: Serena
Reviews.Content: I live on a very limited budget, so when I saw this one on sale for $249, I was thrilled. I read tons of the reviews before finally purchasing. It is the best out there for the price. Great picture, vivid colors and sharp. I didn't even have to adjust them. The sound is good but not great. I'm not a gamer so can't comment on that aspect. The only drawback for me is my current antenna isn't stong enough to pull in all the local stations. I don't have cable or dish, and the $30 RCA antenna wasn't getting the job done. A friend loaned me his amplifier and once I connected it, I was able to pull in several more channels. I am hoping to get a Roku to add to the mix as well though, and that will make all the difference! Overall, I am very pleased with this TV and would definately recommend it. Looks sleek with the glossy black frame, picture is clear/precise and the volume is great. Have to keep turning it down. For the price, well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Very pleasantly surprised
Reviews.Author: Angela Rojas "Angela R."
Reviews.Content: Just received it last night, so far so good. Cinch to put together and the image and sound are clear, vivid, tons of ports. Am changing my cable box though as its an older Scientific Data Optimum version, and know it will give the visuals and sound a kick once its replaced. Still can't believe the price and quality I perceive; hope to have a trouble free usage. Purchased the protection plan for $20 just in case. Set is replacing a Sony Bravia 32" 720P I had in the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Funny that my Sony remote operates this brand TV so well????
Reviews.Author: D. Ertel
Reviews.Content: Update: Had for a month or so now...I notice significant artifacting with fast motion....overall the picture quality seems decent and decent color, brightness etc...but my TV has serious issues forming jaggies when there is fast screen motion...for most TV this is not an issue but for sports I think this set could be disappointing. My source is DirecTV. For audio I connected this set to a sound bar and that resolved my audio weakness concerns completely...FYIMore to come once I've had more time...audio seems weak but several nice options there may help...a soundbar is likely the answer though...picture seems bight and fairly balanced and uniform...there is some brighter edge leaking as is common on many LED TV's...some nice options to adjust the picture as well; the MHL port is nice to have but I really need more time to test this screen.So I'll give it some time and report back.One thing I noticed accidentially is that my Sony Bravia remote operates this TV including several of the detailed features....I wonder what that means????

Reviews.Title: Great buy.
Reviews.Author: James Bruno
Reviews.Content: Got this as an early Christmas present to myself and it has been great. A joy to set up 1-2-3.

Reviews.Title: Good buy so far (even though it seemed a scary inexpensive price)
Reviews.Author: a different Victor "Victor"
Reviews.Content: This purchase has been surprisingly satisfactory.  A family member has been ill so we decided to ceiling mount a TV in their bedroom.  I was looking at a 30" and came across this oCOSMO 40", for the price we decided to give it a try.  We combined it with a Sony BlueRay player with WiFi.  This keeps the only remote cables down to a power cord.  Streaming video and DVDs come from the mounted  WiFi BlueRay player which is attached under the TV (which is on a ceiling mount bracket).  We now have Amazon Instant and Hulu+.  The resulting picture and sound quality is surprisingly good.  We haven't had the system up but for a few days and I haven't tested all the features or inputs of the TV.  The next test is to cable a Chromebook to the TV and see how that works

Reviews.Title: i have a 32 inch lcd that spends $8.60 a year... i love it.. nuff said.
Reviews.Author: JOSHUA NORTON # STOLEN BY AB FROM ME,VRKHAMUDRA
Reviews.Content: nuff said.  you should buy one to save tibet and feed people and take good care of it and so i can be a straight enough porn star.  ha ha. joshua andrew norton,  "live love live" Karoli.

Reviews.Title: defect in screen
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Out of the box, the first time it was turned on the TV had a series of red and blue lines horizontally across the bottom third of the TV.  I guess you get what you pay for...

Reviews.Title: Arrived not working to my satisfaction.
Reviews.Author: Alex King
Reviews.Content: Only 1 HDMI port working, not the one technically correct for my Dish DVR, washed-out looking picture could not be satisfactorily adjusted for the sort of picture one might expect from a new TV.  Returned to AMAZON for full refund, spend more to obtain something that actually looked good out of the box.

Reviews.Title: Tailgating TB
Reviews.Author: Sondra Ricketts
Reviews.Content: The television is to be used at tail gating  parties at the local university football games.  It is very light to a carry and the price was reasonable for a 40" TV

Reviews.Title: I AM USING THIS TV WHILE I AM WRITING THIS. TV IS GREAT.
Reviews.Author: Christo Jean Pierre
Reviews.Content: I INSTALL THE TV IN MY BEDROOM. IT FIT PERFECTLY ON THE WALL WITH THE LOW PROFILE ULTRA SLIM ONE INCH PROFILE TV WALL MOUNT.MY ONLY COMPLAINT IS THAT THE TV IS NOT A 40 INCHES TV AS ADVERTSED. IT IS A 36 INCHES TV. AT LEAST, THIS IS WHAT WAS SHIPPED TO ME. IT WOULD HAVE BEEN SUCH AN AGGRAVATION TO RETURN IT. OTHER THAN THAT, THE TV IS GREAT.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value for money
Reviews.Author: Mikko S Peltoniemi
Reviews.Content: Feels a little plasticky, but for the price you can't beat it. Came in with everything in the box. Quickly unboxed it and installed it. The picture is good - both color and brightness are good.

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: Olga Axionoff
Reviews.Content: When I first got it, I plugged in the 3 colored plugs from the Direct TV into the side where it looks obvious that's where it goes.  I turned it on, but only the "no signal" sign floated around the screen.  I could not get a picture and after a frustrating 3 hours I called Direct TV (it was Saturday and oCosmo was closed) and they walked me through it, still unable to get a picture.  Then, when being behind the TV I noticed there are more plug-ins at the bottom back of the TV.  I had to look under to see it.  It was not obvious.  I tried that, and walla, there it was.  The instructions did not say where to connect.I learned that I have to view the TV through the AV and not the TV or HDTV on Source Select, which I learned through the guy at Direct TV.  BUT, and a big BUT, when I'm viewing my programs, it occasionally jumps to a different source and blanks out the TV and the floating "no signal" comes up.  Its annoying that I need to reset it back to AV each time.  I've had the TV for about a month and it happened at least 5 times.But the picture and sound is good when it is on.  That's why I'm giving it an "OK".

Reviews.Title: Almost a five star
Reviews.Author: James Galvin
Reviews.Content: Hi great TV for the price, smashing deal.  I would have rated it a five star had I not sooooo much trouble with UPS delivery.  The only reason I did get the delivery becuase my neighbor whom I had arranged with UPS to deliver to them, ran into the UPS driver after he put a third note on my door stating he attempted to deliver without me being there.  My neighbor kindly directed him to look at the previous slip on my door authorizing him to sign for it.  I am extremely happy with the TV, but also extremely dissapointed with how UPS handled the delivery.  Maybe Amazon and UPS could communicate more and have the paticulars set up when the item was purchased for delivery.  (  :  )  :

Reviews.Title: Pretty good tv
Reviews.Author: Kevin Kent
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv around black friday..The tv shows good not great but good..sound quality is fairly well..i would recommend this tv if your on a budget

Reviews.Title: Excellent HDTV
Reviews.Author: J. Harmon
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical at first due to the price, but I took a chance due to the great reviews and I'm glad I bought this HDTV. At this size and price you can't go wrong

Reviews.Title: horrible picture quality
Reviews.Author: Niurka Diaz
Reviews.Content: this tv was installed 2 days before it started giving us trouble the colors bled into each other we had blue and red shadows over the picture and no way to tune in the remote control

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive, but inconsistent picture and bad controls
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: The best thing about this TV is that it is very inexpensive.  The downside is that the picture is almost impossible to get "correct".  Turn down the contrast and it gets too dark, turn up the brightness and the colors bloom out of control.  Even if you get it looking good in one situation (i.e. dark movie) it looks horrible in the next situation (i.e. daytime talk show).  So, if you care about color accuracy you don't want this TV.The other issue I have is with the remote control and the ability to switch between sources.  Most TVs have an "input" button that toggles between sources.  This TV's "input" button requires you to use the up/down arrows to change sources.  This makes it completely un-usable with our Tivo remote and requires us to have yet another remote control on the couch.  *yuck*  The quality of the remote is very, very cheap and plastic feeling.  I wouldn't expect this remote to last more than 6 months of normal use.

Reviews.Title: Tv is getting 4 stars,cause
Reviews.Author: Joyce P. Skinner "quarter collector"
Reviews.Content: The measurement of the television on the ad was not correct. I measured the area I was going to install ad when I receive the TV is was too long and the screen measure was 5 inches too large or my place. I am making do with the TV,. I had to put the TV on top of my cabinet .

Reviews.Title: missing half of the parts
Reviews.Author: tom
Reviews.Content: i did not receive the remote control or an owners manual or the hardware for the tv base i was very upset by this and would not reccomend this brand to anyone not a very good qc dept.

Reviews.Title: Worst TV I've Ever Owned
Reviews.Author: Bradesq "Bradesq"
Reviews.Content: This is unquestionably the worst TV I've ever owned:First, I cannot get a crisp picture no matter what I do.  I've tried every adjustment, I've tried swapping out the HDMI cable, everything I can think of -- HD channels (1080i through my cable box) look like standard definition.  This is true even using the Roku with 1080p output -- HD programs continue to look like standard definition.  My old 720p Westinghouse had a much better picture.  I see that others have had a similar problem, but it only seems to affect some units, as many people rave about the picture quality.  If you try to use this as a monitor connected to a PC, you can really see how bad the picture is.Second, the sound works only intermittently.  This also seems to affect only some units (see other reviews).  Sometimes, in the middle of watching a program, the sound will stop working.  The only way to fix it is to turn the TV off and back on.  I initially thought again this was due to a defective HDMI cable, but it continued after swapping out the cable; it also happens with my Roku, which uses a different HDMI cable/input.  When the sound does work, the quality is average, and actually too loud for my liking.  Even on the "1" setting, the lowest volume setting, it is louder than I'd like.  This was helped somewhat by turning off the surround sound feature.Third, the company won't honor the warranty without the original box.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy
Reviews.Author: Samrat
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend this TV and i've returned it back... Sound is horrible and even the picture quality is not good.

Reviews.Title: needs xtras for 1080p tobe seen
Reviews.Author: Daniel D.
Reviews.Content: same ,  but like the tv. I am not a writer ! short and to point should be good enough instead of count down words ! nor did I take typing .

Reviews.Title: Don't be fooled
Reviews.Author: BB
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV on black Friday, for my son for Christmas. It lasted all day Christmas and we started having problems the next day. It is now Jan. 7 and it will not show a picture. I'm going to attempt to call customer service, but if they do nothing I don't care. It's my fault for buying their product. Do not buy!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for....
Reviews.Author: Nancy Anderson
Reviews.Content: This TV is cheap because it is cheap.  It's limsy, has a lousy picture and all around terrible quality.  We returned it.

Reviews.Title: Need to know asap
Reviews.Author: Florence Cohen "CRAZY BOOKER"
Reviews.Content: Im just wondering if it has those 3 holes to plug in the wires to use xbox/playstation etc the red white and yellow things does anyone know if it has it? its a make or break deal to me need to know asap

Reviews.Title: doa
Reviews.Author: Scott Svehlak
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my son....arrived dead on arrival...and now outta of stock....bummer as this was a Xmas gift for his new apartment!

Reviews.Title: Most likely illegitimate reviews...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "mrmnikon"
Reviews.Content: The five star reviews on for this TV are probably fake or paid reviews.  They are all within the last two or three days.  If you look around the internet at other websites that have reviewed this brand - well, let's just say they are not too kind.  It is really obvious that these are not legitimate reviews - verified purchase or not.

Reviews.Title: BUYER BEWARE
Reviews.Author: Tyler Grey
Reviews.Content: This company was founded in this last year and if you go to the website you will find next to nothing about their product. This is because the company "oCOSMO" doesn't actually make their products. They hire third party companies to create their products. Now, if you are to buy this then chances are you will get exactly what you're asking for. A 40-inch high quality LED TV.In the end though when your one-year warranty is up and you need a part, chances are it won't be available, or the part will be very difficult and expensive.Be careful.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for.
Reviews.Author: Dr. H
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a good TV at a great price, but I was not wanting a lot of bells and whistles.  We only use antennae, so I cannot rate how this TV might interact with all the cable products out there.  I am very pleased that I got just what I was looking for.  A good picture and all the features I will ever use (and more).

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV at a great price
Reviews.Author: Heather R.
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV based on the great reviews and am very happy with the purchase. Picture is great and the swivel base feature was an unexpected bonus. Would definitely recommend this TV to anyone looking for a good TV at a great price

ProductInfo.Features:
Sleek & Slim 40" LED 1080P HDTV
3 x HDMI Port, MHL Port, USB Port
ATSC/NTSC/Clear QAM
60 Hz Refresh Rate
Wall mountable 200 x 200 VESA Standard
ProductInfo.Name: oCOSMO 40-inch 1080p 60Hz LED MHL & Roku Ready HDTV (Glossy Black)
